verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَتَّبِعُوا خُطُوَاتِ الشَّيْطَانِ ۚ وَمَن يَتَّبِعْ خُطُوَاتِ الشَّيْطَانِ فَإِنَّهُ يَأْمُرُ بِالْفَحْشَاءِ وَالْمُنكَرِ ۚ وَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ اللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَتُهُ مَا زَكَىٰ مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ أَبَدًا وَلَـٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ يُزَكِّي مَن يَشَاءُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Believers, do not follow in the steps of satan, for those who follow the steps of satan, he bids to indecency and dishonor. But for the bounty of Allah to you, and His Mercy no one of you would ever have been purified; but Allah purifies whom He will; Allah is the Hearer, the Knower.

verses.content: وَلَا يَأْتَلِ أُولُو الْفَضْلِ مِنكُمْ وَالسَّعَةِ أَن يُؤْتُوا أُولِي الْقُرْبَىٰ وَالْمَسَاكِينَ وَالْمُهَاجِرِينَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ وَلْيَعْفُوا وَلْيَصْفَحُوا ۗ أَلَا تُحِبُّونَ أَن يَغْفِرَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Do not let those of you who possess bounty and plenty swear not to give kinsmen, and the poor, and those who emigrate in the way of Allah. Let them pardon and forgive. Do you not yearn that Allah forgives you? And Allah is the Forgiver, the Most Merciful.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَرْمُونَ الْمُحْصَنَاتِ الْغَافِلَاتِ الْمُؤْمِنَاتِ لُعِنُوا فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Surely, those who defame chaste, unsuspecting, believing women, shall be cursed in this world and in the Everlasting Life, and for them there is a mightypunishment.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَشْهَدُ عَلَيْهِمْ أَلْسِنَتُهُمْ وَأَيْدِيهِمْ وَأَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: On the Day when their tongues, hands and feet shall testify against them concerning what they were doing.

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ يُوَفِّيهِمُ اللَّهُ دِينَهُمُ الْحَقَّ وَيَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الْحَقُّ الْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: Upon that Day Allah will pay them their due in full, and they will know that Allah is the clear truth.

verses.content: الْخَبِيثَاتُ لِلْخَبِيثِينَ وَالْخَبِيثُونَ لِلْخَبِيثَاتِ ۖ وَالطَّيِّبَاتُ لِلطَّيِّبِينَ وَالطَّيِّبُونَ لِلطَّيِّبَاتِ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ مُبَرَّءُونَ مِمَّا يَقُولُونَ ۖ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَرِزْقٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: Evil women for evil men, and evil men for evil women; good women for good men, and good men for good women these are clear of what has been said; for them is forgiveness, and a generous provision.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَدْخُلُوا بُيُوتًا غَيْرَ بُيُوتِكُمْ حَتَّىٰ تَسْتَأْنِسُوا وَتُسَلِّمُوا عَلَىٰ أَهْلِهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Believers, do not enter houses other than your houses until you first ask permission and greet with peace the people thereof; that is better for you in order that you remember.

verses.content: فَإِن لَّمْ تَجِدُوا فِيهَا أَحَدًا فَلَا تَدْخُلُوهَا حَتَّىٰ يُؤْذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ وَإِن قِيلَ لَكُمُ ارْجِعُوا فَارْجِعُوا ۖ هُوَ أَزْكَىٰ لَكُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: And if you do not find anyone there, do not enter it until permission is given to you. And if you are told 'Return', so return, that is purer for you; and Allah knows the things you do.

verses.content: لَّيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَدْخُلُوا بُيُوتًا غَيْرَ مَسْكُونَةٍ فِيهَا مَتَاعٌ لَّكُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تُبْدُونَ وَمَا تَكْتُمُونَ
verses.translation: There is no fault in you that you enter uninhabited houses wherein there is benefit for you. Allah knows what you reveal and what you hide.

verses.content: قُل لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَغُضُّوا مِنْ أَبْصَارِهِمْ وَيَحْفَظُوا فُرُوجَهُمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَزْكَىٰ لَهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ خَبِيرٌ بِمَا يَصْنَعُونَ
verses.translation: Say to the believers they should lower their gaze and guard their private parts that is purer for them. Allah is Aware of the things they do.

verses.content: وَقُل لِّلْمُؤْمِنَاتِ يَغْضُضْنَ مِنْ أَبْصَارِهِنَّ وَيَحْفَظْنَ فُرُوجَهُنَّ وَلَا يُبْدِينَ زِينَتَهُنَّ إِلَّا مَا ظَهَرَ مِنْهَا ۖ وَلْيَضْرِبْنَ بِخُمُرِهِنَّ عَلَىٰ جُيُوبِهِنَّ ۖ وَلَا يُبْدِينَ زِينَتَهُنَّ إِلَّا لِبُعُولَتِهِنَّ أَوْ آبَائِهِنَّ أَوْ آبَاءِ بُعُولَتِهِنَّ أَوْ أَبْنَائِهِنَّ أَوْ أَبْنَاءِ بُعُولَتِهِنَّ أَوْ إِخْوَانِهِنَّ أَوْ بَنِي إِخْوَانِهِنَّ أَوْ بَنِي أَخَوَاتِهِنَّ أَوْ نِسَائِهِنَّ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُهُنَّ أَوِ التَّابِعِينَ غَيْرِ أُولِي الْإِرْبَةِ مِنَ الرِّجَالِ أَوِ الطِّفْلِ الَّذِينَ لَمْ يَظْهَرُوا عَلَىٰ عَوْرَاتِ النِّسَاءِ ۖ وَلَا يَضْرِبْنَ بِأَرْجُلِهِنَّ لِيُعْلَمَ مَا يُخْفِينَ مِن زِينَتِهِنَّ ۚ وَتُوبُوا إِلَى اللَّهِ جَمِيعًا أَيُّهَ الْمُؤْمِنُونَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: And say to the believing women, that they lower their gaze cast down their eyes and guard their chastity, and do not reveal their adornment except that which is outward (face and hands); and let them draw their veils over their neck, and not reveal their adornment except to their husbands, or their fathers, or their husbands' fathers, or their sons, or their husbands' sons, or their brothers, or their brothers' sons, or their sisters' sons, or their women, or what their right hands own, or such male attendants having no sexual desire, or children who have not yet attained knowledge of women's private parts; nor let them stamp their feet, so that their hidden ornament is known. And, O believers turn to Allah all together, in order that you prosper.

verses.content: وَأَنكِحُوا الْأَيَامَىٰ مِنكُمْ وَالصَّالِحِينَ مِنْ عِبَادِكُمْ وَإِمَائِكُمْ ۚ إِن يَكُونُوا فُقَرَاءَ يُغْنِهِمُ اللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ وَاسِعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Marry those among you who are spouseless and the virtuous among your male and female slaves (thereby freeing them), if they are poor, Allah will enrichthem of His bounty; Allah is Embracing, Knowing.

verses.content: وَلْيَسْتَعْفِفِ الَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ نِكَاحًا حَتَّىٰ يُغْنِيَهُمُ اللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِ ۗ وَالَّذِينَ يَبْتَغُونَ الْكِتَابَ مِمَّا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُكُمْ فَكَاتِبُوهُمْ إِنْ عَلِمْتُمْ فِيهِمْ خَيْرًا ۖ وَآتُوهُم مِّن مَّالِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي آتَاكُمْ ۚ وَلَا تُكْرِهُوا فَتَيَاتِكُمْ عَلَى الْبِغَاءِ إِنْ أَرَدْنَ تَحَصُّنًا لِّتَبْتَغُوا عَرَضَ الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا ۚ وَمَن يُكْرِههُّنَّ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ مِن بَعْدِ إِكْرَاهِهِنَّ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Let those who do not find the means to marry be abstinent until Allah enriches them of His bounty. Those your right hand owns who seek their freedom, make a contract with them accordingly if you know some good in them, and give them from the wealth of Allah that He has given you. Do not force your slavegirls into prostitution in order to seek worldly gain for they wish to preserve their chastity. Whosoever compels them, surely Allah, after their being compelled, is the Forgiver (to the girls), the Most Merciful.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَنزَلْنَا إِلَيْكُمْ آيَاتٍ مُّبَيِّنَاتٍ وَمَثَلًا مِّنَ الَّذِينَ خَلَوْا مِن قَبْلِكُمْ وَمَوْعِظَةً لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.translation: Now We have sent down to you clarifying verses, and an example of those who passed away before you and admonition to the cautious.

verses.content: اللَّهُ نُورُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ مَثَلُ نُورِهِ كَمِشْكَاةٍ فِيهَا مِصْبَاحٌ ۖ الْمِصْبَاحُ فِي زُجَاجَةٍ ۖ الزُّجَاجَةُ كَأَنَّهَا كَوْكَبٌ دُرِّيٌّ يُوقَدُ مِن شَجَرَةٍ مُّبَارَكَةٍ زَيْتُونَةٍ لَّا شَرْقِيَّةٍ وَلَا غَرْبِيَّةٍ يَكَادُ زَيْتُهَا يُضِيءُ وَلَوْ لَمْ تَمْسَسْهُ نَارٌ ۚ نُّورٌ عَلَىٰ نُورٍ ۗ يَهْدِي اللَّهُ لِنُورِهِ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَيَضْرِبُ اللَّهُ الْأَمْثَالَ لِلنَّاسِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Allah is the Lighter of the heavens and the earth. The example of His Light is like a tube, in which there is a wick. The wick is in a lamp and the lamp is as a glittering planet kindled from a Blessed Tree, an olive that is neither of the East nor of the West. Its oil would almost shine forth though no fire touched it. Light upon light; Allah guides to His Light whom He will. Allah strikes parables for people. Allah has knowledge of all things.

verses.content: فِي بُيُوتٍ أَذِنَ اللَّهُ أَن تُرْفَعَ وَيُذْكَرَ فِيهَا اسْمُهُ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُ فِيهَا بِالْغُدُوِّ وَالْآصَالِ
verses.translation: In houses which Allah has allowed to be raised up, and His Name to be remembered therein. In the morning and evening

verses.content: رِجَالٌ لَّا تُلْهِيهِمْ تِجَارَةٌ وَلَا بَيْعٌ عَن ذِكْرِ اللَّهِ وَإِقَامِ الصَّلَاةِ وَإِيتَاءِ الزَّكَاةِ ۙ يَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا تَتَقَلَّبُ فِيهِ الْقُلُوبُ وَالْأَبْصَارُ
verses.translation: are men who exalt Him there, whom neither trade nor sale can divert from the remembrance of Allah, and establish the prayers, and pay the obligatorycharity; fearing a Day when hearts and eyes shall be turned about,

verses.content: لِيَجْزِيَهُمُ اللَّهُ أَحْسَنَ مَا عَمِلُوا وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ يَرْزُقُ مَن يَشَاءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.translation: that Allah will recompense them for the finest deeds they did and increase them from His bounty. Allah provides without measure to whom He will.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا أَعْمَالُهُمْ كَسَرَابٍ بِقِيعَةٍ يَحْسَبُهُ الظَّمْآنُ مَاءً حَتَّىٰ إِذَا جَاءَهُ لَمْ يَجِدْهُ شَيْئًا وَوَجَدَ اللَّهَ عِندَهُ فَوَفَّاهُ حِسَابَهُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَرِيعُ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: As for the unbelievers, their works are like a mirage in the wilderness. The thirsty person thinks it is water, but when he comes near he finds that it is nothing. He finds Allah there, who pays him his account in full. Allah is Swift in reckoning.

verses.content: أَوْ كَظُلُمَاتٍ فِي بَحْرٍ لُّجِّيٍّ يَغْشَاهُ مَوْجٌ مِّن فَوْقِهِ مَوْجٌ مِّن فَوْقِهِ سَحَابٌ ۚ ظُلُمَاتٌ بَعْضُهَا فَوْقَ بَعْضٍ إِذَا أَخْرَجَ يَدَهُ لَمْ يَكَدْ يَرَاهَا ۗ وَمَن لَّمْ يَجْعَلِ اللَّهُ لَهُ نُورًا فَمَا لَهُ مِن نُّورٍ
verses.translation: Or, they are like darkness upon a deep sea covered with a wave above which is another wave, above which are clouds, darkness piled one upon the other; when he stretches out his hand he can scarcely see it. Indeed, to whomsoever Allah assigns no light, he shall have no light.

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُ مَن فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَالطَّيْرُ صَافَّاتٍ ۖ كُلٌّ قَدْ عَلِمَ صَلَاتَهُ وَتَسْبِيحَهُ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِمَا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Have you not seen how Allah is exalted by those in the heavens and earth, and the birds with outspread wings? He knows its prayers and its exaltations and Allah has knowledge of the things they do.

verses.content: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: To Allah belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth. To Him is the arrival.

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ يُزْجِي سَحَابًا ثُمَّ يُؤَلِّفُ بَيْنَهُ ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُ رُكَامًا فَتَرَى الْوَدْقَ يَخْرُجُ مِنْ خِلَالِهِ وَيُنَزِّلُ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مِن جِبَالٍ فِيهَا مِن بَرَدٍ فَيُصِيبُ بِهِ مَن يَشَاءُ وَيَصْرِفُهُ عَن مَّن يَشَاءُ ۖ يَكَادُ سَنَا بَرْقِهِ يَذْهَبُ بِالْأَبْصَارِ
verses.translation: Have you not seen how Allah drives the clouds, then gathers them and converts them into a mass, then you see rain coming from the midst of them? And He sends down out of heaven mountains in which there is hail, pelting with it whom He will, and turning it away from whom He will. The flash of its lightning almost snatches away the sight.

verses.content: يُقَلِّبُ اللَّهُ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ ۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّأُولِي الْأَبْصَارِ
verses.translation: Allah turns about the night and the day (to succeed one another); surely, in this there is a lesson for those who have eyes.

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَ كُلَّ دَابَّةٍ مِّن مَّاءٍ ۖ فَمِنْهُم مَّن يَمْشِي عَلَىٰ بَطْنِهِ وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَمْشِي عَلَىٰ رِجْلَيْنِ وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَمْشِي عَلَىٰ أَرْبَعٍ ۚ يَخْلُقُ اللَّهُ مَا يَشَاءُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: Allah created everything that walks from water. Some creep upon their bellies, others walk on two feet, and others walk on four. Allah creates whatever He will. Allah is Powerful over everything.

verses.content: لَّقَدْ أَنزَلْنَا آيَاتٍ مُّبَيِّنَاتٍ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.translation: We have sent down clarifying verses. Allah guides whom He will to a Straight Path.

verses.content: وَيَقُولُونَ آمَنَّا بِاللَّهِ وَبِالرَّسُولِ وَأَطَعْنَا ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّىٰ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْهُم مِّن بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ ۚ وَمَا أُولَـٰئِكَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: They say: 'We believe in Allah and the Messenger and obey' But a party of them turn away after this. Those are not believers.

verses.content: وَإِذَا دُعُوا إِلَى اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَهُمْ إِذَا فَرِيقٌ مِّنْهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.translation: And when they are called to Allah and His Messenger so that he judges between them, a party of them swerve away.

verses.content: وَإِن يَكُن لَّهُمُ الْحَقُّ يَأْتُوا إِلَيْهِ مُذْعِنِينَ
verses.translation: If the right is theirs, they would have hastened to him obediently.

verses.content: أَفِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَمِ ارْتَابُوا أَمْ يَخَافُونَ أَن يَحِيفَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَرَسُولُهُ ۚ بَلْ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ
verses.translation: Is there a sickness in their hearts, or, are they in doubt? Do they fear that Allah and His Messenger will be unjust? No, but those they are the harmdoers.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا كَانَ قَوْلَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذَا دُعُوا إِلَى اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَهُمْ أَن يَقُولُوا سَمِعْنَا وَأَطَعْنَا ۚ وَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: But when the believers are called to Allah and His Messenger, in order that he judges between them, their reply is: 'We hear and obey' Such are theprosperous.

verses.content: وَمَن يُطِعِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ وَيَخْشَ اللَّهَ وَيَتَّقْهِ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْفَائِزُونَ
verses.translation: Those who obey Allah and His Messenger, and fear Allah, and have awe of Him, shall be the winners.

verses.content: وَأَقْسَمُوا بِاللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَانِهِمْ لَئِنْ أَمَرْتَهُمْ لَيَخْرُجُنَّ ۖ قُل لَّا تُقْسِمُوا ۖ طَاعَةٌ مَّعْرُوفَةٌ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ خَبِيرٌ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: They swear by Allah in the most earnest oaths, that if you order them, they would go forth. Say: 'Do not swear, known obedience (is better). Allah is Aware of the things you do'

verses.content: قُلْ أَطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا الرَّسُولَ ۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيْهِ مَا حُمِّلَ وَعَلَيْكُم مَّا حُمِّلْتُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوهُ تَهْتَدُوا ۚ وَمَا عَلَى الرَّسُولِ إِلَّا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: Say: 'Obey Allah and obey the Messenger. If you turn away, upon him only rests what is laid upon him, and upon you rests what is laid on you. If you obey him, you shall be guided. It is only for the Messenger to deliver a clear message'

verses.content: وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنكُمْ وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَيَسْتَخْلِفَنَّهُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ كَمَا اسْتَخْلَفَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَلَيُمَكِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ دِينَهُمُ الَّذِي ارْتَضَىٰ لَهُمْ وَلَيُبَدِّلَنَّهُم مِّن بَعْدِ خَوْفِهِمْ أَمْنًا ۚ يَعْبُدُونَنِي لَا يُشْرِكُونَ بِي شَيْئًا ۚ وَمَن كَفَرَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْفَاسِقُونَ
verses.translation: Allah has promised those of you who believe and do good works that He will indeed make them successors in the land as He made those who were before them successors, and that He will indeed establish their religion for them; that which He has approved for them, and will exchange safety for them after their fear. They worship Me and associate nothing with Me. After that, those who disbelieve are the impious.

verses.content: وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَطِيعُوا الرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: Establish the prayers, pay the charity, and obey the Messenger, in order to have mercy.

verses.content: لَا تَحْسَبَنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مُعْجِزِينَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ وَمَأْوَاهُمُ النَّارُ ۖ وَلَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Never think that the unbelievers will be able to frustrate (Us) in the earth. Their refuge is the Fire, an evil arrival.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لِيَسْتَأْذِنكُمُ الَّذِينَ مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُكُمْ وَالَّذِينَ لَمْ يَبْلُغُوا الْحُلُمَ مِنكُمْ ثَلَاثَ مَرَّاتٍ ۚ مِّن قَبْلِ صَلَاةِ الْفَجْرِ وَحِينَ تَضَعُونَ ثِيَابَكُم مِّنَ الظَّهِيرَةِ وَمِن بَعْدِ صَلَاةِ الْعِشَاءِ ۚ ثَلَاثُ عَوْرَاتٍ لَّكُمْ ۚ لَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَا عَلَيْهِمْ جُنَاحٌ بَعْدَهُنَّ ۚ طَوَّافُونَ عَلَيْكُم بَعْضُكُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمُ الْآيَاتِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.translation: Believers, let those your right hand owns and those who have not come of age ask permission of you three times before the dawn prayer, when you put aside your garments, in the heat of noon, and after the night prayer. These are the three occasions of privacy. There is no fault in you or them, apart from these, that they go about you, you are of each other. As such Allah makes plain to you His verses, Allah is the Knower, the Wise.

verses.content: وَإِذَا بَلَغَ الْأَطْفَالُ مِنكُمُ الْحُلُمَ فَلْيَسْتَأْذِنُوا كَمَا اسْتَأْذَنَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ آيَاتِهِ ۗ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.translation: And when children reach the age of puberty, let them ask permission as those before them asked permission. As such Allah makes clear to you His verses. Allah is the Knower, the Wise.

verses.content: وَالْقَوَاعِدُ مِنَ النِّسَاءِ اللَّاتِي لَا يَرْجُونَ نِكَاحًا فَلَيْسَ عَلَيْهِنَّ جُنَاحٌ أَن يَضَعْنَ ثِيَابَهُنَّ غَيْرَ مُتَبَرِّجَاتٍ بِزِينَةٍ ۖ وَأَن يَسْتَعْفِفْنَ خَيْرٌ لَّهُنَّ ۗ وَاللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: (As for) women that are past childbearing who have no hope of marriage there is no fault in them that they discard their cloaks provided they do not reveal their adornments, but it is better if they abstain. Allah is the Hearer, the Knower.

verses.content: لَّيْسَ عَلَى الْأَعْمَىٰ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى الْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى الْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَن تَأْكُلُوا مِن بُيُوتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ آبَائِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ إِخْوَانِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَخَوَاتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَعْمَامِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ عَمَّاتِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ أَخْوَالِكُمْ أَوْ بُيُوتِ خَالَاتِكُمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكْتُم مَّفَاتِحَهُ أَوْ صَدِيقِكُمْ ۚ لَيْسَ عَلَيْكُمْ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَأْكُلُوا جَمِيعًا أَوْ أَشْتَاتًا ۚ فَإِذَا دَخَلْتُم بُيُوتًا فَسَلِّمُوا عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِكُمْ تَحِيَّةً مِّنْ عِندِ اللَّهِ مُبَارَكَةً طَيِّبَةً ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللَّهُ لَكُمُ الْآيَاتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: It shall be no fault for the blind, the lame, the sick and yourselves to eat from your houses. Nor the houses of your fathers', your mothers', your brothers', your sisters', your paternal uncles, your paternal aunts, your maternal uncles, your maternal aunts or in houses the keys of which you own, or in those of your friend, there is no fault in you that you all eat together, or separately. When you enter houses, greet (with peace) one another with a salutation from Allah, blessed and good. As such Allah makes clear to you His verses so that you understand.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَإِذَا كَانُوا مَعَهُ عَلَىٰ أَمْرٍ جَامِعٍ لَّمْ يَذْهَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يَسْتَأْذِنُوهُ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَسْتَأْذِنُونَكَ أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ۚ فَإِذَا اسْتَأْذَنُوكَ لِبَعْضِ شَأْنِهِمْ فَأْذَن لِّمَن شِئْتَ مِنْهُمْ وَاسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمُ اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: The believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger, and who, when gathered with him upon a common matter do not depart till they have asked his permission. Surely, those who ask your permission are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger. When they ask your permission for some of their affairs, grant it to whomever you please and ask Allah for forgiveness for them; Allah is the Forgiver, the Merciful.

verses.content: لَّا تَجْعَلُوا دُعَاءَ الرَّسُولِ بَيْنَكُمْ كَدُعَاءِ بَعْضِكُم بَعْضًا ۚ قَدْ يَعْلَمُ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ يَتَسَلَّلُونَ مِنكُمْ لِوَاذًا ۚ فَلْيَحْذَرِ الَّذِينَ يُخَالِفُونَ عَنْ أَمْرِهِ أَن تُصِيبَهُمْ فِتْنَةٌ أَوْ يُصِيبَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Do not make the calling of the Messenger among yourselves like your calling to one another. Allah knows those of you who slip away surreptitiously, so let those who disobey His command beware, lest they are struck by sedition, or, they are stricken with a painful punishment.

verses.content: أَلَا إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ قَدْ يَعْلَمُ مَا أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ وَيَوْمَ يُرْجَعُونَ إِلَيْهِ فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا ۗ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: To Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and the earth. He has Knowledge of what state you are upon. On the Day when they shall be returned to Him, He will tell them all what they have done. And Allah has knowledge of everything.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَبَارَكَ الَّذِي نَزَّلَ الْفُرْقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ لِيَكُونَ لِلْعَالَمِينَ نَذِيرًا
verses.translation: Blessed is He who has sent down the Criterion to His worshiper (Prophet Muhammad), that he is a warner to all mankind;

verses.content: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَلَمْ يَتَّخِذْ وَلَدًا وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ شَرِيكٌ فِي الْمُلْكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ فَقَدَّرَهُ تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: to whom the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth belongs, who has not taken a son, nor does He have an associate in the Kingdom, and He created everything, then He ordained it very precisely.

verses.content: وَاتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِهِ آلِهَةً لَّا يَخْلُقُونَ شَيْئًا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ لِأَنفُسِهِمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا نَفْعًا وَلَا يَمْلِكُونَ مَوْتًا وَلَا حَيَاةً وَلَا نُشُورًا
verses.translation: Yet they worship, other than Him, gods which cannot create anything and were themselves created. They own neither harm nor benefit for themselves, neither do they own death nor life, nor a resurrection.

verses.content: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا إِفْكٌ افْتَرَاهُ وَأَعَانَهُ عَلَيْهِ قَوْمٌ آخَرُونَ ۖ فَقَدْ جَاءُوا ظُلْمًا وَزُورًا
verses.translation: The unbelievers say: 'This is but a falsehood he has forged? another nation has helped him' So they have come with wrong and falsehood.

verses.content: وَقَالُوا أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ اكْتَتَبَهَا فَهِيَ تُمْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: They say: 'He has written tales of the ancients, they are recited to him at dawn and at the evening'

verses.content: قُلْ أَنزَلَهُ الَّذِي يَعْلَمُ السِّرَّ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
verses.translation: Say: 'It was sent down by Him who knows the secrets of heavens and earth. He is Forgiving, the Most Merciful.

verses.content: وَقَالُوا مَالِ هَـٰذَا الرَّسُولِ يَأْكُلُ الطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشِي فِي الْأَسْوَاقِ ۙ لَوْلَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْهِ مَلَكٌ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُ نَذِيرًا
verses.translation: They also say: 'How is it that this Messenger eats food and walks about the markets? Why has no angel been sent down with him to warn us?

verses.content: أَوْ يُلْقَىٰ إِلَيْهِ كَنزٌ أَوْ تَكُونُ لَهُ جَنَّةٌ يَأْكُلُ مِنْهَا ۚ وَقَالَ الظَّالِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلًا مَّسْحُورًا
verses.translation: Or, why has no treasure been thrown to him, or a garden for him to eat from' And the harmdoers say: 'The man you follow is surely bewitched'

verses.content: انظُرْ كَيْفَ ضَرَبُوا لَكَ الْأَمْثَالَ فَضَلُّوا فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: See how they strike examples for you, surely they have gone astray and are unable to find a way.

verses.content: تَبَارَكَ الَّذِي إِن شَاءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيْرًا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ وَيَجْعَل لَّكَ قُصُورًا
verses.translation: Blessed be He who, if He wills, can assign you better things than these; gardens underneath which rivers flow, and He shall assign for you palaces.

verses.content: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا بِالسَّاعَةِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِالسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: No, they belied the Hour. We have prepared for him who belied the Hour a Blaze.

verses.content: إِذَا رَأَتْهُم مِّن مَّكَانٍ بَعِيدٍ سَمِعُوا لَهَا تَغَيُّظًا وَزَفِيرًا
verses.translation: When it sees them from a far off place, they shall hear it raging and sighing.

verses.content: وَإِذَا أُلْقُوا مِنْهَا مَكَانًا ضَيِّقًا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوْا هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: And when, chained in (iron) fetters, they are cast into some narrow space of the Fire, they will call out for destruction.

verses.content: لَّا تَدْعُوا الْيَوْمَ ثُبُورًا وَاحِدًا وَادْعُوا ثُبُورًا كَثِيرًا
verses.translation: 'Do not call out today for one destruction; call out for many destructions'

verses.content: قُلْ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ أَمْ جَنَّةُ الْخُلْدِ الَّتِي وُعِدَ الْمُتَّقُونَ ۚ كَانَتْ لَهُمْ جَزَاءً وَمَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Say: 'Is that better, or the Garden of Eternity which the cautious have been promised? It is their recompense and their arrival'

verses.content: لَّهُمْ فِيهَا مَا يَشَاءُونَ خَالِدِينَ ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعْدًا مَّسْئُولًا
verses.translation: Living there for ever, they shall find in it all that they desire. That is a promise binding upon your Lord, and to be asked of Him.

verses.content: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ فَيَقُولُ أَأَنتُمْ أَضْلَلْتُمْ عِبَادِي هَـٰؤُلَاءِ أَمْ هُمْ ضَلُّوا السَّبِيلَ
verses.translation: On the Day when He gathers them with all that they worship, other than Allah, He will say: 'Was it you who misled My worshipers, or did they themselves go astray'

verses.content: قَالُوا سُبْحَانَكَ مَا كَانَ يَنبَغِي لَنَا أَن نَّتَّخِذَ مِن دُونِكَ مِنْ أَوْلِيَاءَ وَلَـٰكِن مَّتَّعْتَهُمْ وَآبَاءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَسُوا الذِّكْرَ وَكَانُوا قَوْمًا بُورًا
verses.translation: They will answer: 'Exaltations to You. We should not have taken others for a guardian, but You gave them and their fathers enjoyment until they forgot Your Remembrance and they were a destroyed nation'

verses.content: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوكُم بِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسْتَطِيعُونَ صَرْفًا وَلَا نَصْرًا ۚ وَمَن يَظْلِم مِّنكُمْ نُذِقْهُ عَذَابًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: So they belie what you say, and you can neither turn it aside, nor find any help. Those of you who have done evil, We let them taste a great punishment.

verses.content: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ مِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ إِلَّا إِنَّهُمْ لَيَأْكُلُونَ الطَّعَامَ وَيَمْشُونَ فِي الْأَسْوَاقِ ۗ وَجَعَلْنَا بَعْضَكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ فِتْنَةً أَتَصْبِرُونَ ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: We did not send Messengers before you but that they ate food and walked about in the markets, We have appointed some of you to be a trial for others. Will you endure? Your Lord is the Seer.

verses.content: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ لِقَاءَنَا لَوْلَا أُنزِلَ عَلَيْنَا الْمَلَائِكَةُ أَوْ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَا ۗ لَقَدِ اسْتَكْبَرُوا فِي أَنفُسِهِمْ وَعَتَوْا عُتُوًّا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: Those who do not hope to meet Us ask: 'Why have no angels been sent to us? Why can we not see our Lord' How proud they are within themselves, and have become greatly disdainful.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَ الْمَلَائِكَةَ لَا بُشْرَىٰ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجْرًا مَّحْجُورًا
verses.translation: On the Day when they behold the angels, there will be no glad tidings for the sinners. They will say: 'A refuge which is forbidden'

verses.content: وَقَدِمْنَا إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُوا مِنْ عَمَلٍ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ هَبَاءً مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: Then We shall advance upon the work which they have done and render it as scattered dust.

verses.content: أَصْحَابُ الْجَنَّةِ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَيْرٌ مُّسْتَقَرًّا وَأَحْسَنُ مَقِيلًا
verses.translation: On that Day, the companions of Paradise (will have) a better abode and a finer restingplace.

verses.content: وَيَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ السَّمَاءُ بِالْغَمَامِ وَنُزِّلَ الْمَلَائِكَةُ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: On that Day, the heaven is split asunder with clouds and the angels are sent down in majesty,

verses.content: الْمُلْكُ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْحَقُّ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ وَكَانَ يَوْمًا عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ عَسِيرًا
verses.translation: the true Kingdom on that Day shall belong to the Merciful a harsh day for the unbelievers.

verses.content: وَيَوْمَ يَعَضُّ الظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيْهِ يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي اتَّخَذْتُ مَعَ الرَّسُولِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Upon that Day the harmdoer shall bite his hands, and say: 'Would that I had taken a Path with the Messenger!

verses.content: يَا وَيْلَتَىٰ لَيْتَنِي لَمْ أَتَّخِذْ فُلَانًا خَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Would that I had never chosen soandso for my companion!

verses.content: لَّقَدْ أَضَلَّنِي عَنِ الذِّكْرِ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَاءَنِي ۗ وَكَانَ الشَّيْطَانُ لِلْإِنسَانِ خَذُولًا
verses.translation: He led me astray from the Remembrance after it had reached me, satan is ever the foresaker of humans'

verses.content: وَقَالَ الرَّسُولُ يَا رَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِي اتَّخَذُوا هَـٰذَا الْقُرْآنَ مَهْجُورًا
verses.translation: The Messenger says: 'O my Lord, my people have taken this Koran while deserting it'

verses.content: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلْنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوًّا مِّنَ الْمُجْرِمِينَ ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيًا وَنَصِيرًا
verses.translation: To every Prophet We have appointed an enemy among the harmdoers; your Lord is Sufficient for you, a Guide and a Helper.

verses.content: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ الْقُرْآنُ جُمْلَةً وَاحِدَةً ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِهِ فُؤَادَكَ ۖ وَرَتَّلْنَاهُ تَرْتِيلًا
verses.translation: The unbelievers ask: 'Why was the Koran not sent down to him all at once' As such We strengthen your heart thereby, and We have recited it very distinctly.

verses.content: وَلَا يَأْتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئْنَاكَ بِالْحَقِّ وَأَحْسَنَ تَفْسِيرًا
verses.translation: They do not bring to you any parable but that which We bring to you is the truth and better in explanation.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُحْشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ أُولَـٰئِكَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Those who will be gathered into Gehenna (Hell) upon their faces shall be in the worst in place, and have gone further astray from the Path.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ آتَيْنَا مُوسَى الْكِتَابَ وَجَعَلْنَا مَعَهُ أَخَاهُ هَارُونَ وَزِيرًا
verses.translation: We gave the Book to Moses and gave him his brother Aaron as a minister.

verses.content: فَقُلْنَا اذْهَبَا إِلَى الْقَوْمِ الَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا فَدَمَّرْنَاهُمْ تَدْمِيرًا
verses.translation: (Then) We said: 'Go to the nation who have belied Our signs' And We utterly destroyed them.

verses.content: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ لَّمَّا كَذَّبُوا الرُّسُلَ أَغْرَقْنَاهُمْ وَجَعَلْنَاهُمْ لِلنَّاسِ آيَةً ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلظَّالِمِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: The nation of Noah, We drowned them when they belied their Messenger, and made of them a sign to the nation. For the harmdoers We have prepared a painful punishment

verses.content: وَعَادًا وَثَمُودَ وَأَصْحَابَ الرَّسِّ وَقُرُونًا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرًا
verses.translation: also to Aad and Thamood and the nation of ErRass and many generations in between;

verses.content: وَكُلًّا ضَرَبْنَا لَهُ الْأَمْثَالَ ۖ وَكُلًّا تَبَّرْنَا تَتْبِيرًا
verses.translation: to each of them We gave examples, and each of them We utterly ruined.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَتَوْا عَلَى الْقَرْيَةِ الَّتِي أُمْطِرَتْ مَطَرَ السَّوْءِ ۚ أَفَلَمْ يَكُونُوا يَرَوْنَهَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ نُشُورًا
verses.translation: They have surely passed by the village which was rained upon by evil rain (of stones); what, have they never seen it? No, they look for no resurrection.

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَـٰذَا الَّذِي بَعَثَ اللَّهُ رَسُولًا
verses.translation: Whenever they see you, they mock you (saying): 'Is this whom Allah has sent as a Messenger?

verses.content: إِن كَادَ لَيُضِلُّنَا عَنْ آلِهَتِنَا لَوْلَا أَن صَبَرْنَا عَلَيْهَا ۚ وَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ حِينَ يَرَوْنَ الْعَذَابَ مَنْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: He would have mislead us from our gods, if we had not been steadfast to them' But they shall know who is further astray from the Path when they see the punishment.

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ مَنِ اتَّخَذَ إِلَـٰهَهُ هَوَاهُ أَفَأَنتَ تَكُونُ عَلَيْهِ وَكِيلًا
verses.translation: Have you seen him who has made gods of his own desires? Would you be a guardian over him?

verses.content: أَمْ تَحْسَبُ أَنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ يَسْمَعُونَ أَوْ يَعْقِلُونَ ۚ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا كَالْأَنْعَامِ ۖ بَلْ هُمْ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Do you think that most of them can hear or understand? They are like cattle, no, they are further astray from the Path.

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيْفَ مَدَّ الظِّلَّ وَلَوْ شَاءَ لَجَعَلَهُ سَاكِنًا ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَا الشَّمْسَ عَلَيْهِ دَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Do you not see how your Lord stretches the shadow? Had it been His will, He could have made it constant. Then He appointed the sun to be a guide to it;

verses.content: ثُمَّ قَبَضْنَاهُ إِلَيْنَا قَبْضًا يَسِيرًا
verses.translation: thereafter We seize it to Us withdrawing it gently.

verses.content: وَهُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا وَالنَّوْمَ سُبَاتًا وَجَعَلَ النَّهَارَ نُشُورًا
verses.translation: It is He who has appointed the night a mantle for you and sleep for a rest. The day He has appointed for rising.

verses.content: وَهُوَ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ الرِّيَاحَ بُشْرًا بَيْنَ يَدَيْ رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً طَهُورًا
verses.translation: It is He who loosens the winds, bearing glad tidings before the Hands of His Mercy, and We have sent down pure water from the heaven,

verses.content: لِّنُحْيِيَ بِهِ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا وَنُسْقِيَهُ مِمَّا خَلَقْنَا أَنْعَامًا وَأَنَاسِيَّ كَثِيرًا
verses.translation: so, that with it We revive dead lands and provide drink for the cattle and the human We created.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ صَرَّفْنَاهُ بَيْنَهُمْ لِيَذَّكَّرُوا فَأَبَىٰ أَكْثَرُ النَّاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًا
verses.translation: We have indeed turned it about them, so that they remember; yet most people refuse all except disbelief.

verses.content: وَلَوْ شِئْنَا لَبَعَثْنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرْيَةٍ نَّذِيرًا
verses.translation: Had it been Our will, We could have raised a warner in every village.

verses.content: فَلَا تُطِعِ الْكَافِرِينَ وَجَاهِدْهُم بِهِ جِهَادًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: So do not obey the unbelievers, but struggle mightily with it (the Koran).

verses.content: وَهُوَ الَّذِي مَرَجَ الْبَحْرَيْنِ هَـٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ وَهَـٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخًا وَحِجْرًا مَّحْجُورًا
verses.translation: It was He who let forth the two seas, this one is palatably sweet and this salt, a bitter taste, and He set a barrier between them, and a refuge which is forbidden.

verses.content: وَهُوَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ مِنَ الْمَاءِ بَشَرًا فَجَعَلَهُ نَسَبًا وَصِهْرًا ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًا
verses.translation: And it is He who created the human from water and gave him kindred of blood and of marriage. Your Lord is the Powerful.

verses.content: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُهُمْ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمْ ۗ وَكَانَ الْكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِ ظَهِيرًا
verses.translation: Yet they (the unbelievers) worship, other than Allah, that which can neither benefit nor harm them. Surely, the unbeliever is ever a partisan against his Lord.

verses.content: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا
verses.translation: We did not send you but as a bearer of glad tidings and as a warner.

verses.content: قُلْ مَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَاءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Say: 'I demand of you no wage for this except for he who wishes to take the Path to his Lord'

verses.content: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى الْحَيِّ الَّذِي لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِ خَبِيرًا
verses.translation: Put your trust in the All Living who never dies, and exalt with His praise, He is sufficiently aware of His worshipers' sins.

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ اسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ ۚ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ فَاسْأَلْ بِهِ خَبِيرًا
verses.translation: (It is) He who, in six days created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, and then He willed to the Throne. The Merciful; ask about Him from he who knows Him.

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اسْجُدُوا لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ قَالُوا وَمَا الرَّحْمَـٰنُ أَنَسْجُدُ لِمَا تَأْمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمْ نُفُورًا ۩
verses.translation: When it is said to them: 'Prostrate yourselves before the Merciful', they ask: 'And what is the Merciful? Shall we prostrate ourselves to whatever you bid us' And it increases their aversion.

verses.content: تَبَارَكَ الَّذِي جَعَلَ فِي السَّمَاءِ بُرُوجًا وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِرَاجًا وَقَمَرًا مُّنِيرًا
verses.translation: Blessed be He who has set the constellations in the heaven, and set amongst them a sun, and an illuminating moon.

verses.content: وَهُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ خِلْفَةً لِّمَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يَذَّكَّرَ أَوْ أَرَادَ شُكُورًا
verses.translation: It is He who has made the night and day follow each other for those whom He desires to remember or He desires to be thankful.

verses.content: وَعِبَادُ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ هَوْنًا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ الْجَاهِلُونَ قَالُوا سَلَامًا
verses.translation: The worshipers of the Merciful are those who walk humbly on the earth, and when the ignorant address them say: 'Peace'

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ يَبِيتُونَ لِرَبِّهِمْ سُجَّدًا وَقِيَامًا
verses.translation: who pass the night prostrating and standing to their Lord.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا اصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
verses.translation: Who say: 'Our Lord, turn from us the punishment of Gehenna, for its punishment is the most terrible;

verses.content: إِنَّهَا سَاءَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا
verses.translation: it is an evil settling, and an evil residence'

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ إِذَا أَنفَقُوا لَمْ يُسْرِفُوا وَلَمْ يَقْتُرُوا وَكَانَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامًا
verses.translation: who when they spend are neither wasteful nor miserly, between that is a just stand,

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ لَا يَدْعُونَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ وَلَا يَقْتُلُونَ النَّفْسَ الَّتِي حَرَّمَ اللَّهُ إِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا يَزْنُونَ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ يَلْقَ أَثَامًا
verses.translation: who do not call upon another god with Allah, nor slay the soul which Allah has forbidden except by right; who do not fornicate, for he who does this shall face punishment

verses.content: يُضَاعَفْ لَهُ الْعَذَابُ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ وَيَخْلُدْ فِيهِ مُهَانًا
verses.translation: doubled for him on the Day of Resurrection is his punishment, and therein he shall live, humbled,

verses.content: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَآمَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًا صَالِحًا فَأُولَـٰئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ اللَّهُ سَيِّئَاتِهِمْ حَسَنَاتٍ ۗ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
verses.translation: except he who repents and believes and does good works those, Allah will change their evil deeds into good deeds; Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.

verses.content: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَالِحًا فَإِنَّهُ يَتُوبُ إِلَى اللَّهِ مَتَابًا
verses.translation: He who repents and does good works truly turns to Allah in repentance,

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ لَا يَشْهَدُونَ الزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِاللَّغْوِ مَرُّوا كِرَامًا
verses.translation: and those who do not bear false witness, and when they pass by idle talk, pass by with honor

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُوا بِآيَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَمْ يَخِرُّوا عَلَيْهَا صُمًّا وَعُمْيَانًا
verses.translation: and who when they are reminded of the verses of their Lord, they do not fall down deaf and blind.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
verses.translation: Those who say: 'Lord give us of our wives and children what pleases our eyes and make us leaders to the fearful'

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ يُجْزَوْنَ الْغُرْفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا وَيُلَقَّوْنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةً وَسَلَامًا
verses.translation: Those shall be recompensed with the highest rank for their patience. There they shall receive a greeting, and peace!

verses.content: خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ حَسُنَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا
verses.translation: There they shall live for ever; a fine dwelling place, and residence.

verses.content: قُلْ مَا يَعْبَأُ بِكُمْ رَبِّي لَوْلَا دُعَاؤُكُمْ ۖ فَقَدْ كَذَّبْتُمْ فَسَوْفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامًا
verses.translation: Say: 'My Lord cares little for you if it was not for your supplication, indeed you have belied (the Messenger and the Koran) so it (the punishment) will be fastened'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ طسم
verses.translation: TaSeenMeem.

verses.content: تِلْكَ آيَاتُ الْكِتَابِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: Those are the verses of the clear Book.

verses.content: لَعَلَّكَ بَاخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Perhaps you consume yourself that they are not believers.

verses.content: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ آيَةً فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَاقُهُمْ لَهَا خَاضِعِينَ
verses.translation: If We will, We can send down on them a sign from heaven before which their necks will remain humbled.

verses.content: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍ مِّنَ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: A fresh remembrance has never come to them from the Merciful, except they turn away from it.

verses.content: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنبَاءُ مَا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
verses.translation: So, they belied, but surely the tidings of that they mocked will come to them.

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا إِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: Have they not seen the earth, how many We caused to grow in it every generous kind?

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Surely, in this there is a sign yet most of them do not believe.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Your Lord, He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

verses.content: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰ أَنِ ائْتِ الْقَوْمَ الظَّالِمِينَ
verses.translation: And when your Lord called to Moses, saying: 'Go to the harmdoing nation,

verses.content: قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ أَلَا يَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: the nation of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Me'

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
verses.translation: 'My Lord' he replied, 'I fear they will belie me

verses.content: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِي وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِي فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَارُونَ
verses.translation: and my chest will become constricted and my tongue will not be loosed (in my speech), therefore, send to Aaron.

verses.content: وَلَهُمْ عَلَيَّ ذَنبٌ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ
verses.translation: They hold a sin against me, and I fear that they will kill me'

verses.content: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ فَاذْهَبَا بِآيَاتِنَا ۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ
verses.translation: He said: 'Never so, go both of you with Our signs; We shall be with you, listening

verses.content: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَا إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: go both to Pharaoh and both of you say to him: 'We are (each) a Messenger from the Lord of all the Worlds.

verses.content: أَنْ أَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ
verses.translation: Send forth with us the Children of Israel'

verses.content: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
verses.translation: He (Pharaoh) said (to Moses): 'Did We not bring you up when you were a child? And have you not spent years of your life amongst us?

verses.content: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ الَّتِي فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: Yet you were ungrateful and have done the deed you did'

verses.content: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَا إِذًا وَأَنَا مِنَ الضَّالِّينَ
verses.translation: He (Moses) replied: 'Indeed, I did that when I was among those who stray.

verses.content: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِي رَبِّي حُكْمًا وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: I fled from you because I feared you. But my Lord has given me judgment and made me one of the Messengers.

verses.content: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَيَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ
verses.translation: Is this then the blessing with which you reproach me, that you have the Children of Israel for worshipers'

verses.content: قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَا رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Pharaoh said: 'And what is the Lord of the Worlds'

verses.content: قَالَ رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: 'He' (Moses) replied: 'is the Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, if you believe'

verses.content: قَالَ لِمَنْ حَوْلَهُ أَلَا تَسْتَمِعُونَ
verses.translation: 'Do you not hear' said he (Pharaoh) to those around him.

verses.content: قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: He said, 'Your Lord and the Lord of your fathers, the ancients'

verses.content: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ الَّذِي أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: (Pharaoh) said: 'Surely, the Messenger who has been sent to you is mad!'

verses.content: قَالَ رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: 'He is the Lord of the East and the West' said he (Moses), 'and all that is between them, if you could understand'

verses.content: قَالَ لَئِنِ اتَّخَذْتَ إِلَـٰهًا غَيْرِي لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ الْمَسْجُونِينَ
verses.translation: 'If you take any other god except myself' he (Pharaoh) replied, 'you shall be thrown into prison'

verses.content: قَالَ أَوَلَوْ جِئْتُكَ بِشَيْءٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: 'What, even if I brought you something clear' said he (Moses).

verses.content: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصَّادِقِينَ
verses.translation: He (Pharaoh) replied: 'Show us your sign, if you are of the truthful'

verses.content: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: He cast down his staff and thereupon it was a clear serpent.

verses.content: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيْضَاءُ لِلنَّاظِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then he drew out his hand, and it was luminous to the onlookers.

verses.content: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَاحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: 'This', said he (Pharaoh) to his Council, 'is a cunning sorcerer

verses.content: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
verses.translation: who seeks to expel you from your land by his sorcery. What is your counsel'

verses.content: قَالُوا أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَابْعَثْ فِي الْمَدَائِنِ حَاشِرِينَ
verses.translation: They replied: 'Put him and his brother off for a while, and send heralds to your cities

verses.content: يَأْتُوكَ بِكُلِّ سَحَّارٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: to bring every knowledgeable sorcerer'

verses.content: فَجُمِعَ السَّحَرَةُ لِمِيقَاتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: The sorcerers were gathered at the appointed time on a wellknown day,

verses.content: وَقِيلَ لِلنَّاسِ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّجْتَمِعُونَ
verses.translation: and the people were asked: 'Will you gather

verses.content: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ السَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا هُمُ الْغَالِبِينَ
verses.translation: in order that we shall follow the sorcerers if they are the victors'

verses.content: فَلَمَّا جَاءَ السَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ الْغَالِبِينَ
verses.translation: Then, when the sorcerers came to Pharaoh, they said: 'Shall we receive a wage if we win'

verses.content: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّمِنَ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.translation: 'Yes, indeed' he answered, 'and you shall become among those who are near stationed'

verses.content: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰ أَلْقُوا مَا أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ
verses.translation: Moses said to them: 'Cast down what you cast'

verses.content: فَأَلْقَوْا حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الْغَالِبُونَ
verses.translation: So they cast their ropes and staffs, saying: 'By Pharaoh's might, we shall be the victors'

verses.content: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
verses.translation: Then Moses cast down his staff and it swallowed up their lying invention,

verses.content: فَأُلْقِيَ السَّحَرَةُ سَاجِدِينَ
verses.translation: so the sorcerers were cast down, prostrating themselves,

verses.content: قَالُوا آمَنَّا بِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: saying: 'We believe in the Lord of the Worlds,

verses.content: رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
verses.translation: the Lord of Moses and Aaron'

verses.content: قَالَ آمَنتُمْ لَهُ قَبْلَ أَنْ آذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ الَّذِي عَلَّمَكُمُ السِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَافٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: He (Pharaoh) said: 'You have believed him before I have given you permission. He is the chief of you who has taught you sorcery. But you shall know. I will surely cut off on opposite sides a hand and a foot, and crucify you all.'

verses.content: قَالُوا لَا ضَيْرَ ۖ إِنَّا إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
verses.translation: 'There is no harm' they replied, 'for surely to our Lord we are turning.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَايَانَا أَن كُنَّا أَوَّلَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: We are eager that Our Lord should forgive us our offenses, for we are the first of the believers'

verses.content: وَأَوْحَيْنَا إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِي إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.translation: Also, We revealed to Moses, saying: 'Go with My worshipers by night, for you will be followed'

verses.content: فَأَرْسَلَ فِرْعَوْنُ فِي الْمَدَائِنِ حَاشِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then Pharaoh sent gatherers to the cities.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ لَشِرْذِمَةٌ قَلِيلُونَ
verses.translation: 'These' they said, 'are a small band,

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُمْ لَنَا لَغَائِظُونَ
verses.translation: they have enraged us,

verses.content: وَإِنَّا لَجَمِيعٌ حَاذِرُونَ
verses.translation: and we are a host on our guard'

verses.content: فَأَخْرَجْنَاهُم مِّن جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: As such We expelled them from their gardens and their fountains,

verses.content: وَكُنُوزٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: their treasures and a noble station.

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ وَأَوْرَثْنَاهَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ
verses.translation: As such we gave it to the Children of Israel.

verses.content: فَأَتْبَعُوهُم مُّشْرِقِينَ
verses.translation: At sunrise, they followed them.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا تَرَاءَى الْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَابُ مُوسَىٰ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ
verses.translation: And when the two hosts came in view of each other, Moses' companions said: 'We have been reached'

verses.content: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّ مَعِيَ رَبِّي سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: 'No, indeed' he replied, 'my Lord is with me and He will guide me'

verses.content: فَأَوْحَيْنَا إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ أَنِ اضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ الْبَحْرَ ۖ فَانفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍ كَالطَّوْدِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Then We revealed to Moses: 'Strike the sea with your staff', so it divided and each part was as a mighty mount.

verses.content: وَأَزْلَفْنَا ثَمَّ الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: And there We brought the others on,

verses.content: وَأَنجَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَمَن مَّعَهُ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: and We saved Moses and those who were with him together,

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: then, We drowned the others.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Surely, in that there is a sign; yet most of them do not believe.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Surely, your Lord is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

verses.content: وَاتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ إِبْرَاهِيمَ
verses.translation: And recite to them the news of Abraham.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: He said to his father and to his nation: 'What do you worship'

verses.content: قَالُوا نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَاكِفِينَ
verses.translation: They replied: 'We worship idols and continue cleaving to them'

verses.content: قَالَ هَلْ يَسْمَعُونَكُمْ إِذْ تَدْعُونَ
verses.translation: 'Do they hear you when you call on them' He asked.

verses.content: أَوْ يَنفَعُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَضُرُّونَ
verses.translation: 'Can they benefit you or harm you'

verses.content: قَالُوا بَلْ وَجَدْنَا آبَاءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: They replied: 'No, but we found our fathers doing so'

verses.content: قَالَ أَفَرَأَيْتُم مَّا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: He said: 'Have you considered what you worship,

verses.content: أَنتُمْ وَآبَاؤُكُمُ الْأَقْدَمُونَ
verses.translation: you, and your elderly fathers?

verses.content: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّ لِّي إِلَّا رَبَّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: They are enemies to me except the Lord of all the Worlds

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَنِي فَهُوَ يَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: who created me; and He guides me,

verses.content: وَالَّذِي هُوَ يُطْعِمُنِي وَيَسْقِينِ
verses.translation: and He gives me to eat and drink,

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَرِضْتُ فَهُوَ يَشْفِينِ
verses.translation: who, when I am sick, heals me;

verses.content: وَالَّذِي يُمِيتُنِي ثُمَّ يُحْيِينِ
verses.translation: who makes me to die and then revives me,

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِي خَطِيئَتِي يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: and whom I am eager shall forgive me my sins on the Day of Recompense'

verses.content: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِي بِالصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: My Lord, give me judgment, and join me with the righteous.

verses.content: وَاجْعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And appoint me a tongue of truthfulness among the latter.

verses.content: وَاجْعَلْنِي مِن وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: and place me amongst the inheritors of the Garden of Bliss.

verses.content: وَاغْفِرْ لِأَبِي إِنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الضَّالِّينَ
verses.translation: and forgive my father, for he was among the astray.

verses.content: وَلَا تُخْزِنِي يَوْمَ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: Do not degrade me on the Day when they are resurrected.

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌ وَلَا بَنُونَ
verses.translation: The Day when neither wealth nor sons shall benefit

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى اللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: except him who comes before Allah with a pure heart;

verses.content: وَأُزْلِفَتِ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.translation: and Paradise shall be brought forward to the cautious.

verses.content: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِلْغَاوِينَ
verses.translation: And Hell is brought near to the perverse'

verses.content: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: It will be said to them: 'Where is that you worshipped,

verses.content: مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
verses.translation: other than Allah? Do they help you or even help themselves'

verses.content: فَكُبْكِبُوا فِيهَا هُمْ وَالْغَاوُونَ
verses.translation: And they will be pitched into it, they and the perverse

verses.content: وَجُنُودُ إِبْلِيسَ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.translation: and the hosts of iblis all together.

verses.content: قَالُوا وَهُمْ فِيهَا يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: And they will say while they dispute with one another,

verses.content: تَاللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: 'By Allah, we were certainly in clear error,

verses.content: إِذْ نُسَوِّيكُم بِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: when we made you equal with the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.content: وَمَا أَضَلَّنَا إِلَّا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: It was nothing but the evildoers who led us astray.

verses.content: فَمَا لَنَا مِن شَافِعِينَ
verses.translation: We have no intercessors now,

verses.content: وَلَا صَدِيقٍ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: no caring friend.

verses.content: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً فَنَكُونَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Would that we might return again, and be among the believers'

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Surely, in that there is a sign, yet most of them do not believe.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Surely, Your Lord is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: The nation of Noah, belied their Messengers.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: when Noah, their brother, said to them: 'Will you not be cautious?

verses.content: إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: I am for you an honest Messenger,

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: so fear Allah, and obey me.

verses.content: وَمَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: For this I ask of you no wage, for my wage falls only on the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me'

verses.content: قَالُوا أَنُؤْمِنُ لَكَ وَاتَّبَعَكَ الْأَرْذَلُونَ
verses.translation: They replied: 'Are we to believe you whom the lowliest follow'

verses.content: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِي بِمَا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: He said: 'I have no knowledge of what they have done.

verses.content: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّي ۖ لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: Their account falls only upon My Lord, if you were but aware.

verses.content: وَمَا أَنَا بِطَارِدِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: I will not drive away the believers.

verses.content: إِنْ أَنَا إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: I am only a clear warner'

verses.content: قَالُوا لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَا نُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْمَرْجُومِينَ
verses.translation: 'Noah' they replied, 'if you do not desist you shall be of those stoned'

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِي كَذَّبُونِ
verses.translation: He said: 'My Lord, my nation have belied me.

verses.content: فَافْتَحْ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًا وَنَجِّنِي وَمَن مَّعِيَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: So open between me and them an opening, and save me and the believers who are with me'

verses.content: فَأَنجَيْنَاهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُ فِي الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: We saved him and those who were with him in the laden ship,

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا بَعْدُ الْبَاقِينَ
verses.translation: afterwards, We drowned the rest.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Surely, in that there is a sign; yet most of them do not believe.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Your Lord is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: (The nation of) Aad belied their Messengers.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Hood said to them: 'Will you not be cautious?

verses.content: إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: I am for you an honest Messenger.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: Fear Allah and obey me.

verses.content: وَمَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: For this I ask of you no wage, for my wage falls only on the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.content: أَتَبْنُونَ بِكُلِّ رِيعٍ آيَةً تَعْبَثُونَ
verses.translation: Do you build over each high place a sign to amuse yourselves!

verses.content: وَتَتَّخِذُونَ مَصَانِعَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَخْلُدُونَ
verses.translation: And do you take to yourselves underground reservoirs, in order to live for ever!

verses.content: وَإِذَا بَطَشْتُم بَطَشْتُمْ جَبَّارِينَ
verses.translation: When you assault, you assault like tyrants.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah, and obey me.

verses.content: وَاتَّقُوا الَّذِي أَمَدَّكُم بِمَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Fear Him who has given you all the things you know.

verses.content: أَمَدَّكُم بِأَنْعَامٍ وَبَنِينَ
verses.translation: He has given you flocks and sons,

verses.content: وَجَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: gardens and fountains.

verses.content: إِنِّي أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a dreadful Day'

verses.content: قَالُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْنَا أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ الْوَاعِظِينَ
verses.translation: They replied: 'It is the same to us whether you admonish or whether you are not one of the admonishers.

verses.content: إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا خُلُقُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: That is nothing but a habit of the ancients,

verses.content: وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: and we shall never be punished'

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَاهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: So they belied him, so We destroyed them. Surely, in that there is a sign; yet most of them do not believe.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Surely, your Lord is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Thamood, belied their Messengers.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَالِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: Their brother Salih said to them: 'Will you not be cautious?

verses.content: إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: I am for you an honest Messenger.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah, and obey me.

verses.content: وَمَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: For this I ask of you no wage; my wage falls only upon the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.content: أَتُتْرَكُونَ فِي مَا هَاهُنَا آمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Will you be left secure in this,

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: amidst gardens and fountains,

verses.content: وَزُرُوعٍ وَنَخْلٍ طَلْعُهَا هَضِيمٌ
verses.translation: sown fields and palmtrees, with slender spathes.

verses.content: وَتَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ الْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا فَارِهِينَ
verses.translation: Will you still hew your dwellings in the mountains?

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me.

verses.content: وَلَا تُطِيعُوا أَمْرَ الْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: Do not obey the order of the wasteful,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: who corrupt in the earth, and do not reform'

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مِنَ الْمُسَحَّرِينَ
verses.translation: They replied: 'Surely, you are one of those bewitched.

verses.content: مَا أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِآيَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصَّادِقِينَ
verses.translation: You are but a human like ourselves. Produce for us a sign, if you are of the truthful'

verses.content: قَالَ هَـٰذِهِ نَاقَةٌ لَّهَا شِرْبٌ وَلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: He said: 'Here is a shecamel. She shall have her share of water as you have yours on an appointed day.

verses.content: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوءٍ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: Do not touch her with malice so that punishment of a dreadful day seizes you'

verses.content: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَأَصْبَحُوا نَادِمِينَ
verses.translation: Yet they hamstrung her, and in the morning they were remorseful,

verses.content: فَأَخَذَهُمُ الْعَذَابُ ۗ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: and the punishment seized them. Surely, in that there is a sign. Yet most of them do not believe.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Your Lord, He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Lot's nation, belied their Messengers.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Lot said to them: 'Will you not be cautious?

verses.content: إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: I am for you an honest Messenger.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah, and obey me.

verses.content: وَمَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: I ask of you no wage for this; my wage is only with the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.content: أَتَأْتُونَ الذُّكْرَانَ مِنَ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: What, do you come to the males of the world,

verses.content: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَاجِكُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُونَ
verses.translation: and leave your wives whom your Lord has created for you? No, but you are a transgressing nation'

verses.content: قَالُوا لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَا لُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْمُخْرَجِينَ
verses.translation: 'Lot' they replied, 'if you do not desist, you shall be thrown out'

verses.content: قَالَ إِنِّي لِعَمَلِكُم مِّنَ الْقَالِينَ
verses.translation: He said: 'Truly, I am a detester of what you do'

verses.content: رَبِّ نَجِّنِي وَأَهْلِي مِمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: 'My Lord, save me and my people from that they are doing'

verses.content: فَنَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: So We saved him and all his people,

verses.content: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِي الْغَابِرِينَ
verses.translation: except an old woman who stayed behind,

verses.content: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: then We destroyed the others.

verses.content: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا ۖ فَسَاءَ مَطَرُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: We rained upon them a rain, and evil is the rain (of stones) on those that are warned.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Surely, in that there is a sign. Yet most of them do not believe.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Your Lord, He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

verses.content: كَذَّبَ أَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: The dwellers of the Thicket belied their Messengers.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: Shu'aib said to them: 'Will you not be cautious?

verses.content: إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: I am for you an honest Messenger.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah, and obey me.

verses.content: وَمَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: I ask of you no wage for this; my wage is only with the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.content: أَوْفُوا الْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُونُوا مِنَ الْمُخْسِرِينَ
verses.translation: Fill up the measure, do not be among the cheats,

verses.content: وَزِنُوا بِالْقِسْطَاسِ الْمُسْتَقِيمِ
verses.translation: and weigh with the straight scale,

verses.content: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا النَّاسَ أَشْيَاءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا فِي الْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
verses.translation: and do not diminish the goods of the people, and do not make mischief in the earth, working corruption.

verses.content: وَاتَّقُوا الَّذِي خَلَقَكُمْ وَالْجِبِلَّةَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Fear He who created you, and the generations of the ancient'

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مِنَ الْمُسَحَّرِينَ
verses.translation: They replied: 'You are surely one of those bewitched.

verses.content: وَمَا أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ الْكَاذِبِينَ
verses.translation: You are but a human like ourselves, we think that you are one of the liars.

verses.content: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصَّادِقِينَ
verses.translation: Drop down on us lumps from heaven, if you are one of the truthful'

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّي أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: He said: 'My Lord knows what you are doing'

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ الظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: But they belied him, then the punishment of the Day of Shadow (raining fire) seized them. Truly, it was the punishment of a dreadful day.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Surely, in that there is a sign; yet most of them do not believe.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Your Lord, He is the Almighty, the Most Merciful.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَتَنزِيلُ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Truly, it is the sending of the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.content: نَزَلَ بِهِ الرُّوحُ الْأَمِينُ
verses.translation: The honest Spirit (Gabriel) brought it down

verses.content: عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ لِتَكُونَ مِنَ الْمُنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: upon your heart (Prophet Muhammad), in order to be one of the warners,

verses.content: بِلِسَانٍ عَرَبِيٍّ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: in a clear, Arabic tongue.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَفِي زُبُرِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Truly, it is in the Books of the ancients.

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ آيَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُ عُلَمَاءُ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ
verses.translation: Was it not a sign for them known to the learned of the Children of Israel?

verses.content: وَلَوْ نَزَّلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ بَعْضِ الْأَعْجَمِينَ
verses.translation: If We had revealed it to a nonArab,

verses.content: فَقَرَأَهُ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا بِهِ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: and he had recited it to them, they would not have believed.

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ سَلَكْنَاهُ فِي قُلُوبِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Even so, We have caused it to enter into the hearts of harmdoers:

verses.content: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا الْعَذَابَ الْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: they shall not believe in it until they see the painful punishment

verses.content: فَيَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةً وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: so that it will come upon them suddenly, while they are unaware,

verses.content: فَيَقُولُوا هَلْ نَحْنُ مُنظَرُونَ
verses.translation: and then they will say: 'Shall we be respited'

verses.content: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: Do they wish to hasten Our punishment?

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتَ إِن مَّتَّعْنَاهُمْ سِنِينَ
verses.translation: What do you see? If We gave them enjoyment for years,

verses.content: ثُمَّ جَاءَهُم مَّا كَانُوا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: and then what they were promised comes to them,

verses.content: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا يُمَتَّعُونَ
verses.translation: what avail will their past enjoyments be to them?

verses.content: وَمَا أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ
verses.translation: We never destroyed a village that did not have warners

verses.content: ذِكْرَىٰ وَمَا كُنَّا ظَالِمِينَ
verses.translation: for a reminder, and We never harmed.

verses.content: وَمَا تَنَزَّلَتْ بِهِ الشَّيَاطِينُ
verses.translation: It was not the satans who brought it down:

verses.content: وَمَا يَنبَغِي لَهُمْ وَمَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
verses.translation: it is not for them, nor are they able.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ عَنِ السَّمْعِ لَمَعْزُولُونَ
verses.translation: Truly, they are expelled from hearing.

verses.content: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ الْمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: So do not call upon another god with Allah, lest you should be one of those who are punished.

verses.content: وَأَنذِرْ عَشِيرَتَكَ الْأَقْرَبِينَ
verses.translation: Warn your tribe and your near kinsmen.

verses.content: وَاخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ اتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: and lower your wing to the believers who follow you.

verses.content: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّي بَرِيءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: If they disobey you, say: 'I am quit of what you do'

verses.content: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: Put your trust in the Almighty, the Most Merciful,

verses.content: الَّذِي يَرَاكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: who sees you when you stand

verses.content: وَتَقَلُّبَكَ فِي السَّاجِدِينَ
verses.translation: and when you turn among those who prostrate themselves.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ هُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: Surely, He is the Hearer, the Knower.

verses.content: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ الشَّيَاطِينُ
verses.translation: Shall I tell you on whom the satans descend?

verses.content: تَنَزَّلُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: They descend on every guilty impostor.

verses.content: يُلْقُونَ السَّمْعَ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ كَاذِبُونَ
verses.translation: They listen, but most of them are liars.

verses.content: وَالشُّعَرَاءُ يَتَّبِعُهُمُ الْغَاوُونَ
verses.translation: Poets are followed by the perverse.

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِي كُلِّ وَادٍ يَهِيمُونَ
verses.translation: Have you not seen how they wander in every valley,

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُمْ يَقُولُونَ مَا لَا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: and they say what they do not do?

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَذَكَرُوا اللَّهَ كَثِيرًا وَانتَصَرُوا مِن بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا أَيَّ مُنقَلَبٍ يَنقَلِبُونَ
verses.translation: Except those who believe, and do good works and remember Allah in abundance and became victorious after they had been wronged. The wrongdoers will surely know which turn they will be returning to (Hell).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ طس ۚ تِلْكَ آيَاتُ الْقُرْآنِ وَكِتَابٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: TaSeen. Those are the verses of the Koran, a clear Book,

verses.content: هُدًى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: a guidance and glad tidings to believers,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ الزَّكَاةَ وَهُم بِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: who establish their prayers, and pay the obligatory charity, and are certain of the Everlasting Life.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمْ أَعْمَالَهُمْ فَهُمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.translation: As for those who do not believe in the Everlasting Life, We have decorated for them their works, and they wander blindly.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ لَهُمْ سُوءُ الْعَذَابِ وَهُمْ فِي الْآخِرَةِ هُمُ الْأَخْسَرُونَ
verses.translation: Such are those for whom there is an evil punishment, and in the Everlasting Life are the greatest losers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى الْقُرْآنَ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: You have received the Koran from the Wise, the Knower.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهْلِهِ إِنِّي آنَسْتُ نَارًا سَآتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوْ آتِيكُم بِشِهَابٍ قَبَسٍ لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَصْطَلُونَ
verses.translation: When Moses said to his household: 'Indeed, I can see a fire far away. I will go and bring you news of it or I will bring you a lighted flame so that you can warm yourselves'

verses.content: فَلَمَّا جَاءَهَا نُودِيَ أَن بُورِكَ مَن فِي النَّارِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَسُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And when he came near it he was called: 'Blessed be who is (Moses) in the fire and (the angels) who are around it! Exaltations to Allah, Lord of the Worlds!

verses.content: يَا مُوسَىٰ إِنَّهُ أَنَا اللَّهُ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: Moses, it is I, Allah, the Almighty, the Wise.

verses.content: وَأَلْقِ عَصَاكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَآهَا تَهْتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَانٌّ وَلَّىٰ مُدْبِرًا وَلَمْ يُعَقِّبْ ۚ يَا مُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفْ إِنِّي لَا يَخَافُ لَدَيَّ الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: Cast down your staff' And when he saw it writhing like a serpent, he turned about retreating, and did not turn back. 'Moses, do not fear, indeed theMessengers do not fear (when they are) with Me,

verses.content: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسْنًا بَعْدَ سُوءٍ فَإِنِّي غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: except he who has done evil, then, after evil, has changed into good. I am the Forgiving, Most Merciful.

verses.content: وَأَدْخِلْ يَدَكَ فِي جَيْبِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَاءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوءٍ ۖ فِي تِسْعِ آيَاتٍ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَقَوْمِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا فَاسِقِينَ
verses.translation: Put your hand inside your collar and it will come out luminous without evil? among the nine signs to Pharaoh and his nation, indeed they were an impious nation'

verses.content: فَلَمَّا جَاءَتْهُمْ آيَاتُنَا مُبْصِرَةً قَالُوا هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: But when Our signs came to them visibly, they said: 'This is plain sorcery.'

verses.content: وَجَحَدُوا بِهَا وَاسْتَيْقَنَتْهَا أَنفُسُهُمْ ظُلْمًا وَعُلُوًّا ۚ فَانظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُفْسِدِينَ
verses.translation: They denied them unjustly out of pride, though their souls acknowledged them. See, how was the end of the corrupt workers!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ آتَيْنَا دَاوُودَ وَسُلَيْمَانَ عِلْمًا ۖ وَقَالَا الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٍ مِّنْ عِبَادِهِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: We gave knowledge to David and Solomon. They said: 'Praise be to Allah who has preferred us above many of His believing worshipers'

verses.content: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيْمَانُ دَاوُودَ ۖ وَقَالَ يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ عُلِّمْنَا مَنطِقَ الطَّيْرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَيْءٍ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ الْفَضْلُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: Solomon inherited David. He said: 'Know, my people, we have been taught the speech of birds and given everything. Surely, this is a clear bounty'

verses.content: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيْمَانَ جُنُودُهُ مِنَ الْجِنِّ وَالْإِنسِ وَالطَّيْرِ فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
verses.translation: We gathered to Solomon his army of jinn, humans and birds; gathered and dispersed,

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا أَتَوْا عَلَىٰ وَادِ النَّمْلِ قَالَتْ نَمْلَةٌ يَا أَيُّهَا النَّمْلُ ادْخُلُوا مَسَاكِنَكُمْ لَا يَحْطِمَنَّكُمْ سُلَيْمَانُ وَجُنُودُهُ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: and when they came to the Valley of the Ants, an ant said: 'Ants, go into your dwellings lest Solomon and his army should, unknowingly, crush you'

verses.content: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكًا مِّن قَوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحًا تَرْضَاهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِي بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِي عِبَادِكَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: He smiled, and laughed at its words, and said: 'My Lord, inspire me that I should be thankful for Your blessing with which You have blessed me and my parents, and that I may do good works that will please You. Admit me, by Your Mercy, among Your righteous worshipers'

verses.content: وَتَفَقَّدَ الطَّيْرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِيَ لَا أَرَى الْهُدْهُدَ أَمْ كَانَ مِنَ الْغَائِبِينَ
verses.translation: He reviewed the birds and said: 'Why is it that I do not see the hoopoe here? Or is he among the absent?
