verses.content: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌ بَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: What, when we are dead and turned to dust? That indeed would be an unlikely return'

verses.content: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ الْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَابٌ حَفِيظٌ
verses.translation: We know all that the earth takes away of them, and a Book of Records is with Us.

verses.content: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا بِالْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِي أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.translation: Rather, they belied the truth when it came to them, and now they are in a state of confusion.

verses.content: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوا إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَاهَا وَزَيَّنَّاهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
verses.translation: What, have they never observed the heaven above them, (and seen) how We built and adorned it, leaving no crack?

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَاهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ بَهِيجٍ
verses.translation: We spread out the earth and set upon it firm mountains, and We cause every delightful thing to grow in it

verses.content: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: as a lesson and a reminder to every penitent worshiper.

verses.content: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً مُّبَارَكًا فَأَنبَتْنَا بِهِ جَنَّاتٍ وَحَبَّ الْحَصِيدِ
verses.translation: We sent down blessed water from the sky with which We caused gardens and the grains of harvest to grow,

verses.content: وَالنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَاتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
verses.translation: and tall palmtrees with compact spathes

verses.content: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ الْخُرُوجُ
verses.translation: as a provision for the worshipers; thereby We revived a land that was dead. Such shall be the emerging.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.translation: Before them, the nation of Noah, the nation of ArRass belied and so did Thamood

verses.content: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَانُ لُوطٍ
verses.translation: and Aad, Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot,

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: the dwellers of the Thicket and the nation of Tubba', all belied their Messengers, therefore My threat was realized.

verses.content: أَفَعَيِينَا بِالْخَلْقِ الْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: What, were We wearied by the first creation? No, indeed; yet they are in doubt about a new creation.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِ نَفْسُهُ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
verses.translation: Indeed, We created the human. We know the whisperings of his soul, and are closer to him than the jugular vein.

verses.content: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى الْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: When both receivers (the angels) receive, one on his right, the other on his left,

verses.content: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: whatever phrase he utters, an observer is present.

verses.content: وَجَاءَتْ سَكْرَةُ الْمَوْتِ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.translation: And when the agony of death comes in truth (they will say): 'This is what you have been trying to avoid'

verses.content: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the Horn shall be blown; that is the Day of Threat!

verses.content: وَجَاءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَائِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Each soul shall come with a driver, and a witness.

verses.content: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِي غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَاءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ الْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: (It will be said): 'Of this you have been heedless. Therefore, we have now removed your covering. Today your sight is sharp'

verses.content: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: And his companion will say: 'This is that which I have present'

verses.content: أَلْقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.translation: (It will be said): 'Indeed, cast into Gehenna (Hell) every deviating unbeliever,

verses.content: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.translation: forbidder of good, transgressor and doubter,

verses.content: الَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِي الْعَذَابِ الشَّدِيدِ
verses.translation: who has set up with Allah another god. Indeed, you two, cast him into the terrible punishment'

verses.content: قَالَ قَرِينُهُ رَبَّنَا مَا أَطْغَيْتُهُ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَالٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: And his companion shall say: 'Our Lord, I did not make him insolent, he was far astray'

verses.content: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا لَدَيَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِالْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: He (Allah) will say: 'Do not dispute before Me. I sent you a warning beforehand.

verses.content: مَا يُبَدَّلُ الْقَوْلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَا أَنَا بِظَلَّامٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.translation: The Word cannot be changed with Me; I do not wrong My worshipers'

verses.content: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ امْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
verses.translation: On that Day We shall ask Gehenna: 'Are you full' And it will answer: 'Are there any more'

verses.content: وَأُزْلِفَتِ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: And Paradise, which is not far away, shall be brought closer to those who were cautious.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.translation: (It shall be said to them): 'This is that you were promised. It is for every heeding penitent.

verses.content: مَّنْ خَشِيَ الرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَجَاءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: Whosoever fears the Merciful in the Unseen, and comes with a contrite heart.

verses.content: ادْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَامٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُلُودِ
verses.translation: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity'

verses.content: لَهُم مَّا يَشَاءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.translation: There they have all that they desire, and with Us is much more.

verses.content: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا فِي الْبِلَادِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.translation: How many generations, stronger in might than they have We destroyed before them! They searched the land, could they find any asylum?

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى السَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Surely, in this there is a Reminder for he who has a heart or listens attentively while witnessing.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
verses.translation: In six days We created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them and no weariness touched Us!

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ الْغُرُوبِ
verses.translation: Bear then with patience what they say. Exalt with the praise of your Lord before sunrise and before sunset.

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَارَ السُّجُودِ
verses.translation: And exalt Him in the night, and at the ends of the prostrations.

verses.content: وَاسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ الْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.translation: Listen for the Day when the Caller will call from a nearby place.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ الصَّيْحَةَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُرُوجِ
verses.translation: On the Day when they will hear the Shout, in truth that Day they will emerge.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: It is We who give life and make to die. To Us is the arrival.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ الْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: Upon that Day the earth will be rent asunder from around them as they hurry forth that is an easy gathering for Us.

verses.content: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَا أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِالْقُرْآنِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: Indeed, We know what they say. You (Prophet Muhammad) are not a tyrant over them. Therefore, remind by the Koran whosoever fears (My) threat.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالذَّارِيَاتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.translation: By the scatterers (the wind) scattering,

verses.content: فَالْحَامِلَاتِ وِقْرًا
verses.translation: then the bearers of weight (the clouds),

verses.content: فَالْجَارِيَاتِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: then the easy runners (the ships);

verses.content: فَالْمُقَسِّمَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: then by the distributors (angels), ordered;

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.translation: indeed, that which you are promised is true,

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الدِّينَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: and the recompense shall surely happen.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْحُبُكِ
verses.translation: By the heaven with its passages,

verses.content: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِي قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
verses.translation: surely, you are in different sayings,

verses.content: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.translation: and are turned away from him who is turned.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْخَرَّاصُونَ
verses.translation: Woe to the liars

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: who are heedless in the immersion.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: 'When will the Day of Judgement be' they ask.

verses.content: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.translation: On that Day they shall be tried at the Fire,

verses.content: ذُوقُوا فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: 'Taste your trial. This is what you have sought to hasten'

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: The righteous shall live among gardens and fountains,

verses.content: آخِذِينَ مَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: receiving what their Lord will give them because before this they were gooddoers.

verses.content: كَانُوا قَلِيلًا مِّنَ اللَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: They slept but a little at night,

verses.content: وَبِالْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.translation: and at dawn would ask forgiveness,

verses.content: وَفِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
verses.translation: and in their wealth was a share for whosoever asked and for whosoever was prevented.

verses.content: وَفِي الْأَرْضِ آيَاتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: For those with sure belief there are signs in the earth,

verses.content: وَفِي أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: and also in yourselves. Can you not see?

verses.content: وَفِي السَّمَاءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: In the sky is your provision and that which you are promised.

verses.content: فَوَرَبِّ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَا أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: So by the Lord of heaven and earth, it is as true as your speech.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Have you heard the story of Abraham's honored guests?

verses.content: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا سَلَامًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَامٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.translation: They entered to him and said: 'Peace' And he replied: 'Peace, you are people unknown to me'

verses.content: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ فَجَاءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.translation: So he turned to his household and brought a fattened calf.

verses.content: فَقَرَّبَهُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: He set it before them, saying: 'Will you not eat'

verses.content: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَامٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Then he conceived a fear about them, and they said: 'Have no fear', and gave him the glad tidings that he was to have a knowledgeable son.

verses.content: فَأَقْبَلَتِ امْرَأَتُهُ فِي صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: (Sarah) his wife came with an exclamation and clasped her face, and said: 'Surely, I am a barren old woman'

verses.content: قَالُوا كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْحَكِيمُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: 'Such, says your Lord' they replied: 'He is the Wise, the Knower'

verses.content: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: 'Messengers' said he (Abraham), 'what is your errand'

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّا أُرْسِلْنَا إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: They replied: 'We are sent to a sinful nation,

verses.content: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: so that we bring down stones of clay upon them

verses.content: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: marked by your Lord for the sinful'

verses.content: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: So We brought the believers out of that they were in.

verses.content: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: But We found in it only one household of those who had surrendered themselves,

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَا آيَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ الْعَذَابَ الْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: and left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

verses.content: وَفِي مُوسَىٰ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: In Moses, too, (there were signs). We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority,

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِ وَقَالَ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: but he turned his back with his Assembly, saying: 'He is (either) a sorcerer or a mad man'

verses.content: فَأَخَذْنَاهُ وَجُنُودَهُ فَنَبَذْنَاهُمْ فِي الْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: So We seized him and his hosts and cast them into the sea. Indeed, he was blameworthy.

verses.content: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ الرِّيحَ الْعَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And in Aad. We let loose on them a withering wind

verses.content: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَالرَّمِيمِ
verses.translation: that left nothing it came upon, except that it was ashes.

verses.content: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And in Thamood it was said to them: 'Take your enjoyment for awhile'

verses.content: فَعَتَوْا عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ الصَّاعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: But in their pride they turn away from the commandment of their Lord and the thunderbolt struck them whilst they were looking;

verses.content: فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.translation: they could neither stand up straight, nor were they helped.

verses.content: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا فَاسِقِينَ
verses.translation: And before them the nation of Noah, indeed they were a debauched nation.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءَ بَنَيْنَاهَا بِأَيْدٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.translation: We built the heaven with might, and We widely extended it.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَاهَا فَنِعْمَ الْمَاهِدُونَ
verses.translation: and We cradled the earth. And We are the Best of Cradlers.

verses.content: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: We created two kinds of all things, so that you will remember.

verses.content: فَفِرُّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Therefore, flee to Allah. I am a clear warner to you from Him.

verses.content: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Do not set up with Allah another god. I am a clear warner to you from Him.

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ مَا أَتَى الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Similarly, no Messenger came to those before them but they said: 'Sorcerer, or mad'

verses.content: أَتَوَاصَوْا بِهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Have they handed this down from one to another? No, rather, they are an insolent nation.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَا أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.translation: So turn away from them, you shall not be blamed,

verses.content: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ الذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: But remind, the Reminder will benefit the believers.

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.translation: I have not created mankind and jinn except to worship Me.

verses.content: مَا أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَا أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.translation: I do not desire provision from them, nor do I desire that they should feed Me.

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
verses.translation: Surely, Allah is the Provider, the Possessor of Power, the Mighty.

verses.content: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَابِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.translation: The evildoers shall have for their portion, a portion like their companions (who were destroyed before them). Therefore, they should not ask Us to hasten!

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِن يَوْمِهِمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Woe then to the unbelievers for their Day which they were promised!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالطُّورِ
verses.translation: By the Mount

verses.content: وَكِتَابٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
verses.translation: and by the Book in lines

verses.content: فِي رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
verses.translation: in an exposed parchment

verses.content: وَالْبَيْتِ الْمَعْمُورِ
verses.translation: by the Visited House,

verses.content: وَالسَّقْفِ الْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.translation: and the uplifted roof

verses.content: وَالْبَحْرِ الْمَسْجُورِ
verses.translation: and the sea that is full

verses.content: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: surely, the punishment of your Lord is about to come,

verses.content: مَّا لَهُ مِن دَافِعٍ
verses.translation: there is none to prevent it.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ السَّمَاءُ مَوْرًا
verses.translation: Upon the Day when the heaven spins dizzily

verses.content: وَتَسِيرُ الْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.translation: and the mountains move, moving.

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: On that Day woe to those who belied

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.translation: those who are in plunging, playing.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.translation: On that Day when they shall be pitched into the Fire of Gehenna (Hell),

verses.content: هَـٰذِهِ النَّارُ الَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: (it will be said to them): 'This is the Fire which you belied!

verses.content: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَا أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: Is this magic, or is it that you do you not see?

verses.content: اصْلَوْهَا فَاصْبِرُوا أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: Roast in it, bear it with or without patience, it is the same, you are only being recompensed for that which you used to do'

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: But in the Gardens the righteous shall live in bliss,

verses.content: فَاكِهِينَ بِمَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: rejoicing in all their Lord has given them, and their Lord will guard them against the punishment of Hell.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: (It will be said): 'Eat and drink with a good appetite because of that which you did'

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَاهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.translation: (They shall be) reclining on couches ranged in rows and We shall wed them to houris (virgins of Paradise) with large wide eyes.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَاتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَانٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَا أَلَتْنَاهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.translation: Those who believe, and whose descendants follow in belief, We will join their descendants to them. And We will not reduce them of anything of their deeds. Every one is pledged for what he has earned.

verses.content: وَأَمْدَدْنَاهُم بِفَاكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: We shall give them fruits and meat as they desire.

verses.content: يَتَنَازَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.translation: There they will pass a goblet to one another with neither idle talk nor sin,

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.translation: and youths, of their own, shall pass among them as if they were hidden pearls.

verses.content: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: They will go to one another asking each other questions:

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِي أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.translation: 'When we were among our people' they will say, 'we were ever fearful,

verses.content: فَمَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَانَا عَذَابَ السَّمُومِ
verses.translation: but Allah has been gracious to us and has protected us from the punishment of the burning wind.

verses.content: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْبَرُّ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Before, we were supplicating to Him. He is the Giving, the Most Merciful'

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَا أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Therefore, remind. By the Favor of Allah, you are neither a soothsayer, nor mad.

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِ رَيْبَ الْمَنُونِ
verses.translation: Or do they say: 'He is a poet, we are waiting for some misfortune to befall him'

verses.content: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ الْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.translation: Say: 'Wait if you will; I shall be waiting with you'

verses.content: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَامُهُم بِهَـٰذَا ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Or, do their intellects order them to do this? Or, are they an insolent people?

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Do they say: 'He has invented it' No, they do not believe.

verses.content: فَلْيَأْتُوا بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِ إِن كَانُوا صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: Let them produce a phrase like it, if what they say is true!

verses.content: أَمْ خُلِقُوا مِنْ غَيْرِ شَيْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ الْخَالِقُونَ
verses.translation: Or, were they created out of nothing? Or, were they their own creators?

verses.content: أَمْ خَلَقُوا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or, did they create the heavens and the earth? No, their belief is not certain!

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ الْمُصَيْطِرُونَ
verses.translation: Or, are the treasures of your Lord in their keeping? Or, are they the controllers?

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Or, do they have a ladder on which they listen? Then let any of them that has listened bring a clear authority.

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَكُمُ الْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: Or, has He daughters, and they sons?

verses.content: أَمْ تَسْأَلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.translation: Or, do you ask them for a wage, so that they become weighed down in debt?

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ الْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.translation: Or, is the Unseen in their keeping, so they are writing it down?

verses.content: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا هُمُ الْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Or, do they desire to outwit? The unbelievers are the outwitted.

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Or, do they have a god, other than Allah? Exaltations to Allah above that which they associate!

verses.content: وَإِن يَرَوْا كِسْفًا مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
verses.translation: Even if they saw lumps falling from the sky they would say: 'A massed cloud'

verses.content: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.translation: So leave them till they encounter their Day in which they shall be thunderstruck.

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: The Day when their guile shall not relieve them a thing, and they shall not be helped.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: For the harmdoers there is indeed, a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.

verses.content: وَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: And be patient under the Judgement of your Lord, surely, you are before Our Eyes. And exalt with the praise of your Lord when you arise,

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَارَ النُّجُومِ
verses.translation: and exalt Him in the night and at the declining of the stars.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
verses.translation: By the star when it plunges,

verses.content: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
verses.translation: your companion is neither astray, neither errs,

verses.content: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: nor does he speak out of desire.

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْيٌ يُوحَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed it is not except a Revelation which is revealed,

verses.content: عَلَّمَهُ شَدِيدُ الْقُوَىٰ
verses.translation: taught by One who is Stern in power.

verses.content: ذُو مِرَّةٍ فَاسْتَوَىٰ
verses.translation: Of might, he (Gabriel) stood firm

verses.content: وَهُوَ بِالْأُفُقِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: while he was in the highest horizon;

verses.content: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: then he drew near, and became close

verses.content: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ أَوْ أَدْنَىٰ
verses.translation: he was but two bows' length or even nearer,

verses.content: فَأَوْحَىٰ إِلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ مَا أَوْحَىٰ
verses.translation: so (Allah) revealed to His worshiper (Gabriel) that which he revealed (to Prophet Muhammad).

verses.content: مَا كَذَبَ الْفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰ
verses.translation: His heart did not lie of what he saw.

verses.content: أَفَتُمَارُونَهُ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: What, will you dispute with him about what he sees!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ نَزْلَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, he saw him in another descent

verses.content: عِندَ سِدْرَةِ الْمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: at the Lote Tree (Sidrat tree) of the ending

verses.content: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: close to the Garden of Refuge.

verses.content: إِذْ يَغْشَى السِّدْرَةَ مَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: When there comes to the Lote Tree, that which comes

verses.content: مَا زَاغَ الْبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: his eyes did not swerve, nor did they stray

verses.content: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: for indeed he saw one of the greatest signs of his Lord.

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ اللَّاتَ وَالْعُزَّىٰ
verses.translation: (Among the idols) have you considered allat and al'uzza,

verses.content: وَمَنَاةَ الثَّالِثَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: and, another, the third manat?

verses.content: أَلَكُمُ الذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ الْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: What, have you males, and He females!

verses.content: تِلْكَ إِذًا قِسْمَةٌ ضِيزَىٰ
verses.translation: That is indeed an unjust division.

verses.content: إِنْ هِيَ إِلَّا أَسْمَاءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَا أَنتُمْ وَآبَاؤُكُم مَّا أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَانٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى الْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ الْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: They are but names, named by you and your fathers. Allah has not sent down any authority for them. They follow conjecture and their soul's desire, eventhough the guidance of their Lord has come to them.

verses.content: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَانِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ
verses.translation: Is the human to have whatever he fancies?

verses.content: فَلِلَّهِ الْآخِرَةُ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: To Allah belongs the Eternal life and the first life.

verses.content: وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ لَا تُغْنِي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ اللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَاءُ وَيَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: How many an angel is there in the heavens whose intercession shall not benefit until Allah gives permission to whom He will and is pleased.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ الْمَلَائِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ الْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: Those who disbelieve in the Everlasting Life call the angels by female names.

verses.content: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ الظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِي مِنَ الْحَقِّ شَيْئًا
verses.translation: Yet of this they have no knowledge, they follow mere conjecture, and conjecture does not help against truth.

verses.content: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: So turn from those who turn away from Our Remembrance and only desire this present life.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ الْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اهْتَدَىٰ
verses.translation: That is all they have of knowledge. Your Lord knows best who has strayed from His Path, and those who are guided.

verses.content: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسَاءُوا بِمَا عَمِلُوا وَيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا بِالْحُسْنَى
verses.translation: To Allah belongs whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth. He will recompense the evildoers according to their deeds, and recompense those who have done good with the finest reward

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَائِرَ الْإِثْمِ وَالْفَوَاحِشَ إِلَّا اللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَاسِعُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوا أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: those who avoid the major sin and indecencies except the small sins, indeed your Lord is of immense forgiveness and He is more knowledgeable of you when He created you from the earth and when you were still unborn in your mothers' wombs. Do not praise yourself. Allah knows the cautious.

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي تَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Have you considered he who turns his back,

verses.content: وَأَعْطَىٰ قَلِيلًا وَأَكْدَىٰ
verses.translation: and gives a little, grudgingly?

verses.content: أَعِندَهُ عِلْمُ الْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Or, does he possess knowledge of the Unseen, and can therefore see?

verses.content: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Or, has he not been told of that which is in the Scrolls of Moses

verses.content: وَإِبْرَاهِيمَ الَّذِي وَفَّىٰ
verses.translation: and Abraham, who paid his debt in full?

verses.content: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: That no soul shall bear another's burden,

verses.content: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: and that everyone shall have in his account only that which he worked for,

verses.content: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ
verses.translation: and that his work is surely seen

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُجْزَاهُ الْجَزَاءَ الْأَوْفَىٰ
verses.translation: then, he shall be recompensed for it in full repayment

verses.content: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الْمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: and that the final return is to your Lord,

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَىٰ
verses.translation: that it is He who causes to laugh and causes to weep.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا
verses.translation: and that it is He who causes to die, and causes to live

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ خَلَقَ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: and that it is He who created pairs, the male and the female,

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: from an ejaculated drop (of sperm),

verses.content: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: and that upon Him is the second creation

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَغْنَىٰ وَأَقْنَىٰ
verses.translation: and that it is He who gives riches and causes to hoard,

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ رَبُّ الشِّعْرَىٰ
verses.translation: and that He is the Lord of (the star) Sirius,

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: that it was He that destroyed ancient Aad

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ فَمَا أَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: and Thamood, sparing no one,

verses.content: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: and before them the nation of Noah, they exceeded in evil and were insolent.

verses.content: وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَىٰ
verses.translation: He plunged the villages

verses.content: فَغَشَّاهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
verses.translation: so that there came upon them that which came.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
verses.translation: So which then of your Lord's favors do you dispute?

verses.content: هَـٰذَا نَذِيرٌ مِّنَ النُّذُرِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: This is a warner from the warners of ancient times.

verses.content: أَزِفَتِ الْآزِفَةُ
verses.translation: The Imminent is near at hand;

verses.content: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
verses.translation: none except Allah can disclose it.

verses.content: أَفَمِنْ هَـٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ
verses.translation: Do you marvel then at this discourse (the Koran)?

verses.content: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ
verses.translation: Or do you laugh, and do you not weep

verses.content: وَأَنتُمْ سَامِدُونَ
verses.translation: while you are thoughtless?

verses.content: فَاسْجُدُوا لِلَّهِ وَاعْبُدُوا ۩
verses.translation: Rather, prostrate to Allah and worship Him.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْتَرَبَتِ السَّاعَةُ وَانشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: The Hour is drawing near, and the moon is split (in two).

verses.content: وَإِن يَرَوْا آيَةً يُعْرِضُوا وَيَقُولُوا سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.translation: Yet if they see a sign (the unbelievers) turn their backs and say: 'This is but a continuation of sorcery'

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: They have belied, and follow their own fancies. But, every issue will be settled!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّنَ الْأَنبَاءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.translation: Tidings containing a deterrent have come to them

verses.content: حِكْمَةٌ بَالِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: which are full of wisdom; but the warnings do not help.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ الدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
verses.translation: Therefore, turn away from them. On the Day when the Caller summons them to a terrible thing,

verses.content: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَارُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
verses.translation: their eyes will be humbled as they come out from their graves as if they were scattered locusts,

verses.content: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى الدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.translation: running (with their necks extended) to the Caller. The unbelievers will say: 'This is indeed a harsh Day'

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا مَجْنُونٌ وَازْدُجِرَ
verses.translation: (Long) before them the nation of Noah belied. They belied Our worshiper saying: 'Mad' and he was reprimanded.

verses.content: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانتَصِرْ
verses.translation: Then he supplicated to his Lord, (saying): 'I am overcome, help me'

verses.content: فَفَتَحْنَا أَبْوَابَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَاءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.translation: We opened the Gates of Heaven with torrential water

verses.content: وَفَجَّرْنَا الْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَالْتَقَى الْمَاءُ عَلَىٰ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.translation: and caused the earth to gush with springs, so that the waters met for a predestined matter.

verses.content: وَحَمَلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.translation: We carried him in a well built, watertight vessel made from planks (of wood)

verses.content: تَجْرِي بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَاءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.translation: that ran on under Our Eyes, a recompense for him because he had been disbelieved.

verses.content: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَاهَا آيَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We have left it as a sign. Is there any that will remember?

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How then were My punishment and My warnings!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We have made the Koran easy to remember, is there any that will remember!

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: Aad too belied. How then were My punishment and My warnings!

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِي يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.translation: And We sent against them a howling wind in a Day of continuous of ill fortune

verses.content: تَنزِعُ النَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
verses.translation: and snatched people up as though they were stumps of uprooted palmtrees.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How then were My punishment and My warnings!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We have made the Koran easy to remember, is there any that will remember?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: Thamood, too, belied Our warnings.

verses.content: فَقَالُوا أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَاحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُ إِنَّا إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: They said: 'Are we to follow a mortal who is one of us? Then indeed, we would surely be in error and insane.

verses.content: أَأُلْقِيَ الذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِن بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.translation: Out of all of us has the Reminder been given to him alone? Rather, he is indeed an arrogant liar'

verses.content: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ الْكَذَّابُ الْأَشِرُ
verses.translation: (To him We said): 'Tomorrow they shall know who is the arrogant liar.

verses.content: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُو النَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَارْتَقِبْهُمْ وَاصْطَبِرْ
verses.translation: We are sending to them as a trial, a shecamel, so watch them and have patience.

verses.content: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ الْمَاءَ قِسْمَةٌ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.translation: Tell them that the water is to be divided between them, a drink each for them in turn'

verses.content: فَنَادَوْا صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.translation: But they called their companion who took hold of her and hamstrung her.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: How then were My punishment and My warnings!

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَكَانُوا كَهَشِيمِ الْمُحْتَظِرِ
verses.translation: Then We sent against them one Shout and they became like the trampled twigs of the (sheep) penbuilder.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We have made the Koran an easy Remembrance, is there any that will remember!

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The nation of Lot belied Our warnings.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّا آلَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَاهُم بِسَحَرٍ
verses.translation: We let loose on all of them a squall of claystones, except for the house of Lot whom We saved at dawn

verses.content: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي مَن شَكَرَ
verses.translation: through Our Mercy. So it is that We recompense the thankful.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: He had warned them of Our assault but they disputed the warnings.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَاوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِ فَطَمَسْنَا أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: They even solicited of him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes: 'Now, taste My punishment and My warnings'

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: And at daybreak a determined punishment came upon them.

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: 'Now, taste My punishment and My warnings'

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: We have made the Koran an easy Remembrance, is there any that will remember!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَ آلَ فِرْعَوْنَ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: The warnings also came to Pharaoh's people,

verses.content: كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَاهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: but they belied all Our signs so We seized them with the seizing of the Mighty, Powerful.

verses.content: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُولَـٰئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَاءَةٌ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: What then, are your unbelievers better than those? Or do you have an immunity (written) in the Scrolls?

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
verses.translation: Or do they say: 'We are a gathering that will be victorious'

verses.content: سَيُهْزَمُ الْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ الدُّبُرَ
verses.translation: Most certainly their gatherings shall be routed, and they will turn their backs.

verses.content: بَلِ السَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَالسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.translation: Rather, the Hour is their encounter. And that Hour will be most calamitous and bitter.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُجْرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed the wrongdoers are in error and a raging fire.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِي النَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: On the Day when they are dragged on their faces into the Fire, (it will be said to them): 'Taste the touch of the Scorching'

verses.content: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَاهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, We have created all things according to a measure.

verses.content: وَمَا أَمْرُنَا إِلَّا وَاحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍ بِالْبَصَرِ
verses.translation: And Our Order is but one word like the flashing of an eye.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We destroyed those like you, is there any that will remember!

verses.content: وَكُلُّ شَيْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: All their deeds are in the Scrolls,

verses.content: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
verses.translation: everything, be it great or small, is recorded.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the cautious shall live amid gardens and a river,

verses.content: فِي مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: in a secure abode, in the presence of the Powerful King.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ
verses.translation: The Merciful

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْقُرْآنَ
verses.translation: has taught the Koran.

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ
verses.translation: He created the human

verses.content: عَلَّمَهُ الْبَيَانَ
verses.translation: and taught him its pronunciation.

verses.content: الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ بِحُسْبَانٍ
verses.translation: The sun and the moon to a reckoning.

verses.content: وَالنَّجْمُ وَالشَّجَرُ يَسْجُدَانِ
verses.translation: The stars and the trees prostrate themselves.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ الْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: He raised the heaven on high and set the scale.

verses.content: أَلَّا تَطْغَوْا فِي الْمِيزَانِ
verses.translation: Do not transgress the scales.

verses.content: وَأَقِيمُوا الْوَزْنَ بِالْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا الْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: Give just weight and do not skimp the scales.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ
verses.translation: He set down the earth for the creation.

verses.content: فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَالنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ الْأَكْمَامِ
verses.translation: Therein are fruits and palm trees with sheaths,

verses.content: وَالْحَبُّ ذُو الْعَصْفِ وَالرَّيْحَانُ
verses.translation: the grain in the blade; and aromatic herbs.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both (humans and jinn) belie?

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِن صَلْصَالٍ كَالْفَخَّارِ
verses.translation: He created the human from clay, like earthenware

verses.content: وَخَلَقَ الْجَانَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ
verses.translation: and He created the jinn from smokeless fire.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ الْمَغْرِبَيْنِ
verses.translation: The Lord of the Two Easts, the Lord of the Two Wests.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: مَرَجَ الْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ
verses.translation: He has let forth the two seas, they meet together,

verses.content: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌ لَّا يَبْغِيَانِ
verses.translation: and between them is a barrier which they do not overpass.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا اللُّؤْلُؤُ وَالْمَرْجَانُ
verses.translation: Pearls and corals come from both.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: وَلَهُ الْجَوَارِ الْمُنشَآتُ فِي الْبَحْرِ كَالْأَعْلَامِ
verses.translation: Also, His are the ships that run, raised up like mountains upon the sea.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: كُلُّ مَنْ عَلَيْهَا فَانٍ
verses.translation: All that live on it will perish.

verses.content: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
verses.translation: Yet the Face of your Lord will abide forever, Majestic and Splendid.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: يَسْأَلُهُ مَن فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأْنٍ
verses.translation: Whosoever is in the heaven and earth ask Him. Every day He is upon an affair (He reveals according to His Eternal determination).

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: سَنَفْرُغُ لَكُمْ أَيُّهَ الثَّقَلَانِ
verses.translation: We shall surely aim, O both burdened.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: يَا مَعْشَرَ الْجِنِّ وَالْإِنسِ إِنِ اسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا مِنْ أَقْطَارِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ فَانفُذُوا ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَانٍ
verses.translation: Tribe of jinn and of human, if you are able to penetrate the provinces of heaven and earth, pass through them! But you shall not pass through except with a power!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
verses.translation: Flames of fire and molten copper shall be loosed against you, and you shall not be helped.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: فَإِذَا انشَقَّتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَالدِّهَانِ
verses.translation: When the heaven splits asunder and turns crimson, like red leather.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْأَلُ عَن ذَنبِهِ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: On that Day, neither human nor jinn shall be asked about his sin.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: يُعْرَفُ الْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَاهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِالنَّوَاصِي وَالْأَقْدَامِ
verses.translation: The sinners shall be known by their mark, they shall be seized by their forelocks and their feet.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: هَـٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: This is Gehenna (Hell) which the sinners belied,

verses.content: يَطُوفُونَ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ آنٍ
verses.translation: they shall go round between it, and between a hot, boiling water.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: And for he who fears the standing (before) his Lord there are two Gardens.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: ذَوَاتَا أَفْنَانٍ
verses.translation: (Gardens) with many branches.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ تَجْرِيَانِ
verses.translation: Therein are two running fountains.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَاكِهَةٍ زَوْجَانِ
verses.translation: Therein are two kinds of every fruit.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍ بَطَائِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى الْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ
verses.translation: (They shall) recline on couches lined with brocade, and the fruits of the Gardens will be near at hand.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: فِيهِنَّ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: Therein are maidens who restrain their glances, whom neither human nor jinn have touched before.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُنَّ الْيَاقُوتُ وَالْمَرْجَانُ
verses.translation: As (lovely as) rubies and as (beautiful as) coral.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: هَلْ جَزَاءُ الْإِحْسَانِ إِلَّا الْإِحْسَانُ
verses.translation: Shall the recompense of goodness be anything other than goodness?

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: وَمِن دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: And beside these there shall be two Gardens.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: مُدْهَامَّتَانِ
verses.translation: The greenest of green pastures.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ
verses.translation: Therein are two gushing fountains of water.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَنَخْلٌ وَرُمَّانٌ
verses.translation: In them are fruits, palm trees and pomegranates.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: فِيهِنَّ خَيْرَاتٌ حِسَانٌ
verses.translation: In them shall be good and pleasing.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: حُورٌ مَّقْصُورَاتٌ فِي الْخِيَامِ
verses.translation: Maidens (of Paradise, Houris) in cloistered cool pavilions.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: Neither human nor jinn will have touched them before.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ رَفْرَفٍ خُضْرٍ وَعَبْقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٍ
verses.translation: Reclining on green cushions and fine carpets.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?

verses.content: تَبَارَكَ اسْمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
verses.translation: Blessed be the Name of your Lord, Majestic, Splendid.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا وَقَعَتِ الْوَاقِعَةُ
verses.translation: When the Event (the resurrection) comes

verses.content: لَيْسَ لِوَقْعَتِهَا كَاذِبَةٌ
verses.translation: there is no denying its coming

verses.content: خَافِضَةٌ رَّافِعَةٌ
verses.translation: (it will) abase (some) and exalt (others).

verses.content: إِذَا رُجَّتِ الْأَرْضُ رَجًّا
verses.translation: When the earth is shaken

verses.content: وَبُسَّتِ الْجِبَالُ بَسًّا
verses.translation: and the mountains fragmented

verses.content: فَكَانَتْ هَبَاءً مُّنبَثًّا
verses.translation: becoming scattered dust,

verses.content: وَكُنتُمْ أَزْوَاجًا ثَلَاثَةً
verses.translation: you shall be divided into three parties,

verses.content: فَأَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Companions of the Right, what are the Companions of the Right?

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.translation: Companions of the Left, what are the Companions of the Left?

verses.content: وَالسَّابِقُونَ السَّابِقُونَ
verses.translation: And the Outstrippers, the Outstrippers

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: those are they brought near (to their Lord)

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: in the Gardens of Delight,

verses.content: ثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: a host of the ancients

verses.content: وَقَلِيلٌ مِّنَ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: but only a few from the later generations.

verses.content: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّوْضُونَةٍ
verses.translation: on lavish couches

verses.content: مُّتَّكِئِينَ عَلَيْهَا مُتَقَابِلِينَ
verses.translation: they shall recline, facing each other,

verses.content: يَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ
verses.translation: (and there) shall wait on them immortal youths

verses.content: بِأَكْوَابٍ وَأَبَارِيقَ وَكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍ
verses.translation: with goblets and ewers, and a cup from a spring

verses.content: لَّا يُصَدَّعُونَ عَنْهَا وَلَا يُنزِفُونَ
verses.translation: that will neither make the head throb, nor intoxicate,

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةٍ مِّمَّا يَتَخَيَّرُونَ
verses.translation: with fruits of their own choice

verses.content: وَلَحْمِ طَيْرٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: and any flesh of fowl that they desire.

verses.content: وَحُورٌ عِينٌ
verses.translation: And wideeyed houris

verses.content: كَأَمْثَالِ اللُّؤْلُؤِ الْمَكْنُونِ
verses.translation: like hidden pearls,

verses.content: جَزَاءً بِمَا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: a recompense for all that they did.

verses.content: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا تَأْثِيمًا
verses.translation: There they shall hear no idle talk, no cause of sin,

verses.content: إِلَّا قِيلًا سَلَامًا سَلَامًا
verses.translation: but only the saying: 'Peace, Peace'

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الْيَمِينِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: The Companions of the Right

verses.content: فِي سِدْرٍ مَّخْضُودٍ
verses.translation: (will be) among thornless Lote trees.

verses.content: وَطَلْحٍ مَّنضُودٍ
verses.translation: Bananatrees, piled

verses.content: وَظِلٍّ مَّمْدُودٍ
verses.translation: and continuous shade,

verses.content: وَمَاءٍ مَّسْكُوبٍ
verses.translation: and flowing water

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ
verses.translation: and an abundance of fruits,

verses.content: لَّا مَقْطُوعَةٍ وَلَا مَمْنُوعَةٍ
verses.translation: unfailing and not forbidden.

verses.content: وَفُرُشٍ مَّرْفُوعَةٍ
verses.translation: And couches raised up.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنشَأْنَاهُنَّ إِنشَاءً
verses.translation: Indeed We formed them (the houris and all believing women),

verses.content: فَجَعَلْنَاهُنَّ أَبْكَارًا
verses.translation: and made them virgins,

verses.content: عُرُبًا أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: chaste, loving companions of the same age

verses.content: لِّأَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: for the Companions of the Right

verses.content: ثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: a multitude of the ancients,

verses.content: وَثُلَّةٌ مِّنَ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and a multitude of the later people.

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الشِّمَالِ مَا أَصْحَابُ الشِّمَالِ
verses.translation: As for the Companions of the Left

verses.content: فِي سَمُومٍ وَحَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: (they shall live) amid burning winds and boiling water,

verses.content: وَظِلٍّ مِّن يَحْمُومٍ
verses.translation: in the shadow of a smoking blaze,

verses.content: لَّا بَارِدٍ وَلَا كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: neither cool nor good.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُتْرَفِينَ
verses.translation: Before they lived at ease,

verses.content: وَكَانُوا يُصِرُّونَ عَلَى الْحِنثِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: and persisted in the great sin

verses.content: وَكَانُوا يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: and constantly said: 'What, when we are dead and become dust and bones, shall we then be restored to life?

verses.content: أَوَآبَاؤُنَا الْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: What, and our fathers, the ancients'

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّ الْأَوَّلِينَ وَالْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: Say: 'Those of ancient times and those of later times

verses.content: لَمَجْمُوعُونَ إِلَىٰ مِيقَاتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: shall be gathered together to the appointed time on a known Day'

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ أَيُّهَا الضَّالُّونَ الْمُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then you went astray, you that belied,

verses.content: لَآكِلُونَ مِن شَجَرٍ مِّن زَقُّومٍ
verses.translation: you shall eat (the fruit) of the Tree of Zakkum.

verses.content: فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ
verses.translation: You shall fill your bellies with it,

verses.content: فَشَارِبُونَ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ الْحَمِيمِ
verses.translation: and drink boiling water on top of that,

verses.content: فَشَارِبُونَ شُرْبَ الْهِيمِ
verses.translation: and you will drink as the lapping of thirsty camels.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا نُزُلُهُمْ يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Such shall be your hospitality on the Day of Recompense.

verses.content: نَحْنُ خَلَقْنَاكُمْ فَلَوْلَا تُصَدِّقُونَ
verses.translation: We created you, why will you not believe!

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُم مَّا تُمْنُونَ
verses.translation: Have you thought about what (sperm) you ejaculate?

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ تَخْلُقُونَهُ أَمْ نَحْنُ الْخَالِقُونَ
verses.translation: Did you create it, or are We the Creator?

verses.content: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ الْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: It was We who decreed death among you. We will not be surpassed

verses.content: عَلَىٰ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمْثَالَكُمْ وَنُنشِئَكُمْ فِي مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: that We will change you and cause you to grow again in a way you do not know.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: You have surely known of the first creation. Why then, will you not remember!

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُم مَّا تَحْرُثُونَ
verses.translation: Ponder upon the soil you till,

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ تَزْرَعُونَهُ أَمْ نَحْنُ الزَّارِعُونَ
verses.translation: is it you that sow it, or are We the Sower?

verses.content: لَوْ نَشَاءُ لَجَعَلْنَاهُ حُطَامًا فَظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّهُونَ
verses.translation: If We will, We would make it broken stubble and you would remain wondering,

verses.content: إِنَّا لَمُغْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: (Saying:) 'We are laden with debts!

verses.content: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ
verses.translation: Rather, we have been prevented'

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ الْمَاءَ الَّذِي تَشْرَبُونَ
verses.translation: Have you thought about the water you drink?

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ مِنَ الْمُزْنِ أَمْ نَحْنُ الْمُنزِلُونَ
verses.translation: Is it you that send it down from the clouds or We?

verses.content: لَوْ نَشَاءُ جَعَلْنَاهُ أُجَاجًا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: If We will, We would make it bitter, why then do you not give thanks?

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ النَّارَ الَّتِي تُورُونَ
verses.translation: Have you thought about the fire you kindle?

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَنشَأْتُمْ شَجَرَتَهَا أَمْ نَحْنُ الْمُنشِئُونَ
verses.translation: Is it you that originated its tree, or are We the Originator?

verses.content: نَحْنُ جَعَلْنَاهَا تَذْكِرَةً وَمَتَاعًا لِّلْمُقْوِينَ
verses.translation: We have made it a reminder, and a blessing to the traveler.

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Then, exalt the Name of your Lord, the Great.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِمَوَاقِعِ النُّجُومِ
verses.translation: I swear by the fallings of the stars

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَقَسَمٌ لَّوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: and that is a mighty oath, if you but knew

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقُرْآنٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: it is indeed a Glorious Koran,

verses.content: فِي كِتَابٍ مَّكْنُونٍ
verses.translation: in a Book protected (from tampering)

verses.content: لَّا يَمَسُّهُ إِلَّا الْمُطَهَّرُونَ
verses.translation: which none shall touch except the purified;

verses.content: تَنزِيلٌ مِّن رَّبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: a sending down from the Lord of all the Worlds.

verses.content: أَفَبِهَـٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ أَنتُم مُّدْهِنُونَ
verses.translation: What, do you hold this discourse in disdain,

verses.content: وَتَجْعَلُونَ رِزْقَكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: do you make it your provision to belie it?

verses.content: فَلَوْلَا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ الْحُلْقُومَ
verses.translation: Why, then, when the soul leaps up to the throat of the dying

verses.content: وَأَنتُمْ حِينَئِذٍ تَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: and you are watching at that time

verses.content: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: We are nearer to him than you, but you do not see

verses.content: فَلَوْلَا إِن كُنتُمْ غَيْرَ مَدِينِينَ
verses.translation: why then, if you are not revived,

verses.content: تَرْجِعُونَهَا إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: do you not restore his soul, if you are truthful?

verses.content: فَأَمَّا إِن كَانَ مِنَ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.translation: If he is among the near

verses.content: فَرَوْحٌ وَرَيْحَانٌ وَجَنَّتُ نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: there shall be calmness and ease, a Garden of Delight.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِن كَانَ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: If he is a Companion of the Right

verses.content: فَسَلَامٌ لَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: (he will be greeted with): 'Peace be upon you, Companion of the Right'

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِن كَانَ مِنَ الْمُكَذِّبِينَ الضَّالِّينَ
verses.translation: But, if he is of those who belied, and went astray,

verses.content: فَنُزُلٌ مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: there shall be a hospitality of boiling water,

verses.content: وَتَصْلِيَةُ جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: and a roasting in Hell.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ حَقُّ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Indeed, this is the certain truth.

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: So exalt the Name of your Lord, the Great.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: All that is in the heavens and earth exalt Allah. He is the Almighty, the Wise.

verses.content: لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: To Him belongs the Kingdom in the heavens and earth. It is He who revives and causes to die, and He has power over all things.

verses.content: هُوَ الْأَوَّلُ وَالْآخِرُ وَالظَّاهِرُ وَالْبَاطِنُ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: He is the First and the Last, the Clear and the Hidden. He has knowledge of all things.

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ ثُمَّ اسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى الْعَرْشِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا ۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: He created the heavens and the earth in six days, and willed to the Throne. He knows what penetrates the earth and all that emerges from it; all that descends from heaven and all that ascends to it. He is with you wherever you are. Allah sees the things you do.

verses.content: لَّهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ الْأُمُورُ
verses.translation: To Him belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth. To Him all matters shall return.

verses.content: يُولِجُ اللَّيْلَ فِي النَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ النَّهَارَ فِي اللَّيْلِ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: He causes the night to enter into the day and the day to enter into the night. He has knowledge of the thoughts of the innermost of the chests.

verses.content: آمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَأَنفِقُوا مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسْتَخْلَفِينَ فِيهِ ۖ فَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنكُمْ وَأَنفَقُوا لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: Believe in Allah and His Messenger and spend (in charity) of that which He has made you successors. Whosoever of you believes and spends shall have amighty wage.

verses.content: وَمَا لَكُمْ لَا تُؤْمِنُونَ بِاللَّهِ ۙ وَالرَّسُولُ يَدْعُوكُمْ لِتُؤْمِنُوا بِرَبِّكُمْ وَقَدْ أَخَذَ مِيثَاقَكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Why is it that you do not believe in Allah, when the Messenger calls on you to believe in your Lord, and He has made a covenant with you if you arebelievers?

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ آيَاتٍ بَيِّنَاتٍ لِّيُخْرِجَكُم مِّنَ الظُّلُمَاتِ إِلَى النُّورِ ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ بِكُمْ لَرَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: It is He who sends down clear verses to His worshiper, so that He brings you out of the darkness into the light. Indeed, Allah is the Gentle, the Most Merciful to you.

verses.content: وَمَا لَكُمْ أَلَّا تُنفِقُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَاثُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ لَا يَسْتَوِي مِنكُم مَّنْ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبْلِ الْفَتْحِ وَقَاتَلَ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَعْظَمُ دَرَجَةً مِّنَ الَّذِينَ أَنفَقُوا مِن بَعْدُ وَقَاتَلُوا ۚ وَكُلًّا وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: And why is it that you do not spend in the Way of Allah, when the inheritance of the heavens and earth belong to Allah alone? Those who spent before the victory and took part in the fighting are mightier in rank and are not equal to those who spent and fought thereafter. Yet, Allah has promised each a fine reward, and Allah is Aware of what you do.

verses.content: مَّن ذَا الَّذِي يُقْرِضُ اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا فَيُضَاعِفَهُ لَهُ وَلَهُ أَجْرٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: Who will lend a generous loan to Allah? He will multiply it for him and he shall receive a generous wage.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ يَسْعَىٰ نُورُهُم بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَبِأَيْمَانِهِم بُشْرَاكُمُ الْيَوْمَ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: The Day (will surely come) when you shall see believing men and women with their light running before them on their right hands, (it will be said to them):'Glad tidings for you this Day. You shall live for ever in Gardens underneath which rivers flow! That is indeed the mighty triumph.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُولُ الْمُنَافِقُونَ وَالْمُنَافِقَاتُ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا انظُرُونَا نَقْتَبِسْ مِن نُّورِكُمْ قِيلَ ارْجِعُوا وَرَاءَكُمْ فَالْتَمِسُوا نُورًا فَضُرِبَ بَيْنَهُم بِسُورٍ لَّهُ بَابٌ بَاطِنُهُ فِيهِ الرَّحْمَةُ وَظَاهِرُهُ مِن قِبَلِهِ الْعَذَابُ
verses.translation: On that Day the hypocrites, both men and women, will say to the believers: 'Wait for us so that we can take from your light' But they will be answered: 'Go back and seek a light' And a wall with a door shall be between them. Inside it there is mercy, and outside will be the punishment.

verses.content: يُنَادُونَهُمْ أَلَمْ نَكُن مَّعَكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنَّكُمْ فَتَنتُمْ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَتَرَبَّصْتُمْ وَارْتَبْتُمْ وَغَرَّتْكُمُ الْأَمَانِيُّ حَتَّىٰ جَاءَ أَمْرُ اللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِاللَّهِ الْغَرُورُ
verses.translation: They will call out to them, saying: 'Were we not with you' 'Yes' they will reply, 'but you tempted yourselves, you waited (for problems to befall thebelievers), and you doubted, and were deluded by your own fancies until the Command of Allah came, and the deluder (satan) deluded you concerning Allah.

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا يُؤْخَذُ مِنكُمْ فِدْيَةٌ وَلَا مِنَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ مَأْوَاكُمُ النَّارُ ۖ هِيَ مَوْلَاكُمْ ۖ وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Today no ransom shall be accepted from you or from the unbelievers. Your shelter is the Fire, that is your sponsor, the worst arrival'

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَأْنِ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَن تَخْشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمْ لِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ الْحَقِّ وَلَا يَكُونُوا كَالَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ مِن قَبْلُ فَطَالَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْأَمَدُ فَقَسَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَاسِقُونَ
verses.translation: Is it not time that the hearts of the believers be humbled to the Remembrance of Allah and the truth which He has sent down? They should not be like those who were given the Book before this, whose time became very long so that their hearts became hardened. Many of them were impious.

verses.content: اعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يُحْيِي الْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۚ قَدْ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ الْآيَاتِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: Know that Allah revives the earth after it was dead. We have made plain to you the signs in order that you understand.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَالْمُصَّدِّقَاتِ وَأَقْرَضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا يُضَاعَفُ لَهُمْ وَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who give in charity, be they men or women, and those who lend a good loan to Allah, shall be repaid in multiples. They shall receive agenerous wage.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الصِّدِّيقُونَ ۖ وَالشُّهَدَاءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ لَهُمْ أَجْرُهُمْ وَنُورُهُمْ ۖ وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا أُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Those who believe in Allah and His Messengers are the sincere and the martyrs before their Lord, they shall have their reward and their light. But those that disbelieve and belied Our verses are the inhabitants of Gehenna (Hell).

verses.content: اعْلَمُوا أَنَّمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌ وَلَهْوٌ وَزِينَةٌ وَتَفَاخُرٌ بَيْنَكُمْ وَتَكَاثُرٌ فِي الْأَمْوَالِ وَالْأَوْلَادِ ۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيْثٍ أَعْجَبَ الْكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَاهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَكُونُ حُطَامًا ۖ وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ وَمَغْفِرَةٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضْوَانٌ ۚ وَمَا الْحَيَاةُ الدُّنْيَا إِلَّا مَتَاعُ الْغُرُورِ
verses.translation: Know that the life of this world is but play and an amusement, and adornment, and a cause for boasting among you, a rivalry for greater riches and children. It is like rain whose vegetation pleases the unbelievers, but then it withers and turns yellow, becoming broken stubble. In the Everlasting Life is a terrible punishment, forgiveness, and great pleasure from Allah. The life of this world is nothing except the joy of delusion.

verses.content: سَابِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَغْفِرَةٍ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرْضُهَا كَعَرْضِ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ أُعِدَّتْ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ فَضْلُ اللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ ذُو الْفَضْلِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Therefore, race for forgiveness from your Lord, and for a Garden as wide as heaven and earth, prepared for those who believe in Allah and His Messengers. Such is the Favor of Allah; He gives it to whom He will. Allah is the Owner of great favor.

verses.content: مَا أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٍ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي أَنفُسِكُمْ إِلَّا فِي كِتَابٍ مِّن قَبْلِ أَن نَّبْرَأَهَا ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: No affliction can befall either the earth, or yourself, except that it is (written) in a Book before We created it. That is easy for Allah;

verses.content: لِّكَيْلَا تَأْسَوْا عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمْ وَلَا تَفْرَحُوا بِمَا آتَاكُمْ ۗ وَاللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخْتَالٍ فَخُورٍ
verses.translation: so that you will not be saddened for whatever does not come to you, nor be overjoyed in what has come to you. Allah does not love those who are proudand boastful

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يَبْخَلُونَ وَيَأْمُرُونَ النَّاسَ بِالْبُخْلِ ۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الْغَنِيُّ الْحَمِيدُ
verses.translation: nor those who are mean, and encourage others to be mean. And he that turns away, (know) that Allah is Rich and Praised.

verses.content: لَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ وَأَنزَلْنَا مَعَهُمُ الْكِتَابَ وَالْمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ النَّاسُ بِالْقِسْطِ ۖ وَأَنزَلْنَا الْحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأْسٌ شَدِيدٌ وَمَنَافِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعْلَمَ اللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُ وَرُسُلَهُ بِالْغَيْبِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ
verses.translation: We have sent Our Messengers with proofs, and sent them with the Book and the Scales, so that people might establish the Scale (of justice). We have sent down iron in which there is great might and diverse benefit for people, so that Allah knows those who help Him and His Messengers in the Unseen. Indeed, Allah is the Strong, the Almighty.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا وَإِبْرَاهِيمَ وَجَعَلْنَا فِي ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا النُّبُوَّةَ وَالْكِتَابَ ۖ فَمِنْهُم مُّهْتَدٍ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَاسِقُونَ
verses.translation: We sent forth Noah and Abraham, and appointed the Prophethood and the Book to be given to their descendants. Some were guided, but many wereimpious.

verses.content: ثُمَّ قَفَّيْنَا عَلَىٰ آثَارِهِم بِرُسُلِنَا وَقَفَّيْنَا بِعِيسَى ابْنِ مَرْيَمَ وَآتَيْنَاهُ الْإِنجِيلَ وَجَعَلْنَا فِي قُلُوبِ الَّذِينَ اتَّبَعُوهُ رَأْفَةً وَرَحْمَةً وَرَهْبَانِيَّةً ابْتَدَعُوهَا مَا كَتَبْنَاهَا عَلَيْهِمْ إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ رِضْوَانِ اللَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوْهَا حَقَّ رِعَايَتِهَا ۖ فَآتَيْنَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنْهُمْ أَجْرَهُمْ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَاسِقُونَ
verses.translation: Following them We sent Our (other) Messengers, and We sent following in their footsteps, (Prophet) Jesus, the son of Mary and gave him the Gospel, and put tenderness and mercy in the hearts of his followers. As for monasticism, they invented it thereby seeking the pleasure of Allah. We did not write it for them, and they did not observe it as it should be observed. We gave to those of them who believed their wage, but many of them are impious.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَآمِنُوا بِرَسُولِهِ يُؤْتِكُمْ كِفْلَيْنِ مِن رَّحْمَتِهِ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ نُورًا تَمْشُونَ بِهِ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Believers, fear Allah and believe in His Messenger (Prophet Muhammad), He will give you a double portion of His Mercy and He will make for you a light inwhich to walk, and forgive you; Allah is the Forgiver and the Most Merciful.

verses.content: لِّئَلَّا يَعْلَمَ أَهْلُ الْكِتَابِ أَلَّا يَقْدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَيْءٍ مِّن فَضْلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَأَنَّ الْفَضْلَ بِيَدِ اللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَاللَّهُ ذُو الْفَضْلِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: So that the People of the Book may know that they have no power over any of the favors of Allah; that the favors are in the Hand of Allah; He gives it towhom He will. The Favor of Allah is the Great.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قَدْ سَمِعَ اللَّهُ قَوْلَ الَّتِي تُجَادِلُكَ فِي زَوْجِهَا وَتَشْتَكِي إِلَى اللَّهِ وَاللَّهُ يَسْمَعُ تَحَاوُرَكُمَا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: Allah has heard the words of her that reasons with you (Prophet Muhammad) concerning her husband and made her complaint to Allah. Allah has heard both of you discussing with one another. Indeed, Allah is the Hearer, the Seer.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُظَاهِرُونَ مِنكُم مِّن نِّسَائِهِم مَّا هُنَّ أُمَّهَاتِهِمْ ۖ إِنْ أُمَّهَاتُهُمْ إِلَّا اللَّائِي وَلَدْنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَيَقُولُونَ مُنكَرًا مِّنَ الْقَوْلِ وَزُورًا ۚ وَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٌ
verses.translation: Those of you who say to their wives, 'Be as my mother's back' indeed, they are not their mothers. Their mothers are only those who gave birth to them. Indeed they speak dishonorably and falsely. But Allah is the Pardoning, the Forgiving.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ يُظَاهِرُونَ مِن نِّسَائِهِمْ ثُمَّ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا قَالُوا فَتَحْرِيرُ رَقَبَةٍ مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَتَمَاسَّا ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ تُوعَظُونَ بِهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: Those who say to their wives, 'Be as my mother's back' then retract their words thereafter shall set a person free before they touch each other again. By that you are admonished. Allah is Aware of all that you do.

verses.content: فَمَن لَّمْ يَجِدْ فَصِيَامُ شَهْرَيْنِ مُتَتَابِعَيْنِ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَتَمَاسَّا ۖ فَمَن لَّمْ يَسْتَطِعْ فَإِطْعَامُ سِتِّينَ مِسْكِينًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِتُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ۚ وَتِلْكَ حُدُودُ اللَّهِ ۗ وَلِلْكَافِرِينَ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: He who is unable shall fast for two successive months before they touch one another. If he is unable to do this, let him feed sixty needy people that, so that you believe in Allah and His Messenger. Such are the bounds of Allah. There is a painful punishment awaiting the unbelievers.
