verses.translation: and go in fear of the punishment of their Lord,

verses.content: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍ
verses.translation: for none is secure from the punishment of their Lord,

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَافِظُونَ
verses.translation: who guard their privates

verses.content: إِلَّا عَلَىٰ أَزْوَاجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَانُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
verses.translation: except from their wives and what their right hands own, for these they are not blameworthy.

verses.content: فَمَنِ ابْتَغَىٰ وَرَاءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْعَادُونَ
verses.translation: But whosoever seeks beyond that, they are the transgressors.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَانَاتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَاعُونَ
verses.translation: (Those) who keep their trusts and their covenant,

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَادَاتِهِمْ قَائِمُونَ
verses.translation: and standby their witnessing,

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
verses.translation: and who are constant in their prayers.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ مُّكْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: Those are highly honored in the Gardens.

verses.content: فَمَالِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِعِينَ
verses.translation: But what is the matter with the unbelievers, that they strain their glances continuously towards them,

verses.content: عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ
verses.translation: on the right and on the left in groups?

verses.content: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: What, is every one of them eager to be admitted to the Garden of Bliss?

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُم مِّمَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Not at all, for We have created them of what they know.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ الْمَشَارِقِ وَالْمَغَارِبِ إِنَّا لَقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: No, I swear by the Lord of the Easts and the Wests that We have the ability

verses.content: عَلَىٰ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: to exchange them with others better than they; nothing can outstrip Us!

verses.content: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا وَيَلْعَبُوا حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: So leave them alone to plunge and play, until they encounter the Day which they are promised;

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍ يُوفِضُونَ
verses.translation: the Day when they shall rush from their graves, as if they were hurrying to a raised flag,

verses.content: خَاشِعَةً أَبْصَارُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الَّذِي كَانُوا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: their eyes are humbled and they are covered with humiliation. Such is the Day that they were promised.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: We sent Noah to his nation, saying: 'Give warning to your nation before a painful punishment overtakes them'

verses.content: قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ إِنِّي لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: He said: 'My nation, I am a clear warner for you.

verses.content: أَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: Worship Allah, fear Him, and obey me.

verses.content: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ إِذَا جَاءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: He will forgive you your sins and respite you till an appointed term. When the term of Allah arrives it cannot be deferred; if you but knew'

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِي لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
verses.translation: 'My Lord' said he, 'night and day I have called my nation,

verses.content: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَائِي إِلَّا فِرَارًا
verses.translation: but my call has only increased them in running away.

verses.content: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوا أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ وَاسْتَغْشَوْا ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا اسْتِكْبَارًا
verses.translation: Each time I called them so that You might forgive them, they thrust their fingers in their ears and wrapped themselves in their garments, and persisted becomingvery proud.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
verses.translation: I called to them clearly,

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
verses.translation: and indeed, I spoke to them both publicly and in secret:

verses.content: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.translation: "Ask for forgiveness of your Lord," I said. "Surely, He is the Forgiver.

verses.content: يُرْسِلِ السَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
verses.translation: He will let loose the sky upon you in abundance

verses.content: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَارًا
verses.translation: and give to you wealth and sons, and provide you with gardens and rivers.

verses.content: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
verses.translation: What is the matter with you that you do not want the Greatness of Allah,

verses.content: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
verses.translation: He has created you by stages!

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا
verses.translation: Have you not seen how Allah created the seven heavens one above the other,

verses.content: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
verses.translation: setting in them the moon as a light and the sun as a lantern?

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ أَنبَتَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
verses.translation: Allah has caused you to grow out of the earth,

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
verses.translation: and to it He will return you. Then, He will bring you forth.

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
verses.translation: Allah has made the earth spread out for you

verses.content: لِّتَسْلُكُوا مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
verses.translation: so that you walk in its spacious paths.'

verses.content: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِي وَاتَّبَعُوا مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.translation: Noah said: 'My Lord, they have rebelled against me and followed he whose wealth and offspring increase him only in loss,

verses.content: وَمَكَرُوا مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
verses.translation: they have devised a mighty plot,

verses.content: وَقَالُوا لَا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
verses.translation: and said: 'Do not renounce your gods, do not leave waddan or suwa'an or yaghutha, or ya'uqa, or nasra'

verses.content: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَالًا
verses.translation: And they have led many astray. (Noah supplicated saying): 'Allah, do not increase the harmdoers except in error'

verses.content: مِّمَّا خَطِيئَاتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا فَأُدْخِلُوا نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا لَهُم مِّن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
verses.translation: So because of their sins they were drowned and admitted into the Fire. They found none to help them other than Allah.

verses.content: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.translation: And Noah (supplicated) saying: 'My Lord, do not leave a single unbeliever upon the earth.

verses.content: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوا إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
verses.translation: Surely, if You leave them they will mislead Your worshipers and father none but the immoral, and unbelievers.

verses.content: رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا
verses.translation: Forgive me, My Lord, and my parents, and whosoever seeks refuge in my house as a believer, and the believers men and women alike, and do not increase the harmdoers except in ruin'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ اسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ الْجِنِّ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْآنًا عَجَبًا
verses.translation: Say: 'It is revealed to me that a party of jinn listened then said: "We have indeed heard a wonderful Koran,

verses.content: يَهْدِي إِلَى الرُّشْدِ فَآمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَا أَحَدًا
verses.translation: that guides to the Right Path. We believe in it and we will not associate anyone with our Lord.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ تَعَالَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا اتَّخَذَ صَاحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
verses.translation: He exalted be the Majesty of our Lord, who has neither taken to Himself a wife, nor a son!

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى اللَّهِ شَطَطًا
verses.translation: The ignorant fool among us has spoken outrageously against Allah,

verses.content: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَن لَّن تَقُولَ الْإِنسُ وَالْجِنُّ عَلَى اللَّهِ كَذِبًا
verses.translation: we never thought that either human or jinn would ever tell a lie against Allah!'

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ الْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ الْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
verses.translation: But there were certain men from mankind who would take refuge with certain males from the jinn and they increased them in tyranny.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ اللَّهُ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: Like you, they thought that Allah would never raise the dead.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا السَّمَاءَ فَوَجَدْنَاهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
verses.translation: (The jinn continued saying): "We made our way towards heaven, but we found it filled with stern guards and a flame.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَاعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ الْآنَ يَجِدْ لَهُ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
verses.translation: There, we would sit to eavesdrop, but now an eavesdropper finds a flame in wait for him.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِي أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
verses.translation: And so we do not know whether evil is intended for those on earth, or whether their Lord intends to guide them.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الصَّالِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَائِقَ قِدَدًا
verses.translation: Some of us are righteous, but some are otherwise, we are sects that differ.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ اللَّهَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُ هَرَبًا
verses.translation: We know that we cannot frustrate Allah in the earth, nor can we frustrate Him by flight.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا الْهُدَىٰ آمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِن بِرَبِّهِ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
verses.translation: When we heard the Guidance, we believed in it, and whosoever believes in his Lord shall fear neither shortage nor injustice.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا رَشَدًا
verses.translation: Some of us have surrendered (Muslims) and some of us have deviated. Those who surrendered sought the Right Path,

verses.content: وَأَمَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
verses.translation: but those who have deviated shall become the fuel of Gehenna (Hell).

verses.content: وَأَن لَّوِ اسْتَقَامُوا عَلَى الطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَاهُم مَّاءً غَدَقًا
verses.translation: If they had followed the Path We would give to them abundant water to drink,

verses.content: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
verses.translation: and tested them with it. And whosoever turns away from his Lord's Remembrance, He will hurl him into a stern punishment.

verses.content: وَأَنَّ الْمَسَاجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: Mosques belong to Allah, so do not call to anyone else, other than Allah.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ اللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
verses.translation: When the worshiper of Allah stood supplicating to Him, they swarmed around him (Prophet Muhammad).

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَدْعُو رَبِّي وَلَا أُشْرِكُ بِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say: 'I supplicate only to my Lord and I do not associate any with Him'

verses.content: قُلْ إِنِّي لَا أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
verses.translation: Say: 'Indeed, I possess no power over you, either for harm or for guidance'

verses.content: قُلْ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ اللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say: 'None shall protect me from Allah, and other than Him, I will find no refuge,

verses.content: إِلَّا بَلَاغًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَرِسَالَاتِهِ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ فَإِنَّ لَهُ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا
verses.translation: except a deliverance from Allah and His Messages. He who disobeys Allah and His Messenger, for him is the Fire of Gehenna, which he will be in for ever.

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا رَأَوْا مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
verses.translation: When they see that which they were promised they shall know who is weaker in helpers and fewer in numbers.

verses.content: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِي أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُ رَبِّي أَمَدًا
verses.translation: Say: 'I do not know whether that which you are promised is near, or whether my Lord will set for it a time.

verses.content: عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: He is the Knower of the Unseen and does not disclose His Unseen to anyone,

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنِ ارْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُ يَسْلُكُ مِن بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ رَصَدًا
verses.translation: except only to a Messenger that He has chosen, and He sends guardians before him and behind him,

verses.content: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا رِسَالَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ عَدَدًا
verses.translation: so that He may know that they have delivered the Messages of their Lord and He encompasses all that is with them, and He has counted everything innumbers'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُزَّمِّلُ
verses.translation: O you (Prophet Muhammad) wrapped,

verses.content: قُمِ اللَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: rise (to pray) the night except a little;

verses.content: نِّصْفَهُ أَوِ انقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: half the night, or a little less

verses.content: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ الْقُرْآنَ تَرْتِيلًا
verses.translation: or a little more; and with recitation, recite the Koran.

verses.content: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِي عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: We are about to cast upon you a weighty Word.

verses.content: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ اللَّيْلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطْئًا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, the first part of night is heavier in tread, and more upright in speech.

verses.content: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي النَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: You have by day prolonged occupations.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
verses.translation: Remember the Name of your Lord and dedicate yourself devoutly to Him.

verses.content: رَّبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَاتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
verses.translation: He is the Lord of the East and the West; there is no god except Him. Take Him for your Guardian.

verses.content: وَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
verses.translation: Bear patiently with what they say and with a fine abandonment forsake them.

verses.content: وَذَرْنِي وَالْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُولِي النَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Leave to Me those who belie, those who lead a life of pleasure, and bear with them yet a little while.

verses.content: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَا أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
verses.translation: We have fetters (for them) and a blazing fire,

verses.content: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: choking food and a painful punishment.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ الْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا
verses.translation: On the Day when the earth with all its mountains quake and the mountains become heaps of shifting sand.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَاهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness over you, just as We sent a Messenger to Pharaoh.

verses.content: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ الرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَاهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Pharaoh disobeyed Our Messenger, so We seized him remorselessly.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ الْوِلْدَانَ شِيبًا
verses.translation: If you disbelieve, how will you guard yourself against the Day that will make children gray haired,

verses.content: السَّمَاءُ مُنفَطِرٌ بِهِ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُ مَفْعُولًا
verses.translation: on which the heaven will split apart, and His promise is done.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: This is indeed a Reminder. Let whosoever will take the Path to his Lord.

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطَائِفَةٌ مِّنَ الَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَاسْتَغْفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Your Lord knows that you keep vigil nearly two thirds of the night and sometimes half or onethird of it, and a party of those with you. Allah measures thenight and the day. He knows that you cannot count it, and turns to you. Therefore, recite from the Koran as much as is easy (for you); He knows that among youthere are the sick and others traveling the road seeking the bounty of Allah; and others fighting in the Way of Allah. So then, recite from it as much as is easy. Establish your prayers, pay the obligatory charity, and lend Allah a generous loan. Whatever good you shall forward to your souls' account, you surely will find it better with Allah, and a mightier wage. And supplicate for the forgiveness of Allah. Allah is the Forgiving, the Merciful.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.translation: O you (Prophet Muhamad), the cloaked,

verses.content: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
verses.translation: arise and warn,

verses.content: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
verses.translation: and exalt your Lord,

verses.content: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
verses.translation: and purify your clothing,

verses.content: وَالرُّجْزَ فَاهْجُرْ
verses.translation: and flee from the statues!

verses.content: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
verses.translation: Do not give, thinking to gain greater

verses.content: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَاصْبِرْ
verses.translation: be patient unto your Lord.

verses.content: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي النَّاقُورِ
verses.translation: When the Horn is blown,

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: that shall be a Harsh Day

verses.content: عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ
verses.translation: and it will not be easy for the unbelievers.

verses.content: ذَرْنِي وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا
verses.translation: Leave Me alone with he whom I created

verses.content: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُ مَالًا مَّمْدُودًا
verses.translation: and designated for him ample wealth,

verses.content: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا
verses.translation: and sons that stand in witness.

verses.content: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُ تَمْهِيدًا
verses.translation: I made things smooth and easy for him,

verses.content: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
verses.translation: yet he is eager that I increase him.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهُ كَانَ لِآيَاتِنَا عَنِيدًا
verses.translation: Not at all! Surely, he has been disobedient to Our verses.

verses.content: سَأُرْهِقُهُ صَعُودًا
verses.translation: I will constrain him to a hard ascent.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
verses.translation: He reflected, and then determined

verses.content: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: death seized him, how was his determining!

verses.content: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Again, death seized him, how was his determining!

verses.content: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
verses.translation: Then he looked,

verses.content: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
verses.translation: frowned and scowled;

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: then he retreated and grew proud

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
verses.translation: and said: 'This is no more than traced sorcery;

verses.content: إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا قَوْلُ الْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: It is nothing but the word of a mortal'

verses.content: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: I will surely roast him in the Scorching.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرُ
verses.translation: What will let you know what the Scorching is like!

verses.content: لَا تُبْقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
verses.translation: It neither spares, nor releases,

verses.content: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: and it burns the flesh.

verses.content: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
verses.translation: Over it are nineteen (angels guarding).

verses.content: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَائِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَيَزْدَادَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِيمَانًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَن يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: We have appointed none but angels to guard the Fire, and made their number only as a trial for the unbelievers, so that those to whom the Book was given are certain and those who believe increase in belief. And that those who were given the Book, and those who believe will not be in doubt. And that those in whose hearts there is a sickness, together with the unbelievers, may say: 'What did Allah intend by this as an example' As such, Allah leaves in error whom He will and He guides whomsoever He will. None knows the hosts of your Lord except He. This is no more than a Reminder to humans.

verses.content: كَلَّا وَالْقَمَرِ
verses.translation: No, by the moon!

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
verses.translation: By the receding night

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا أَسْفَرَ
verses.translation: and the morning when it appears,

verses.content: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ
verses.translation: it is one of the greatest trials,

verses.content: نَذِيرًا لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: a warning to humans,

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: to whoever among you desires to go forward, or lag behind.

verses.content: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.translation: Each soul is held in pledge for what it earns,

verses.content: إِلَّا أَصْحَابَ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: except the Companions of the Right.

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: In Gardens they will question

verses.content: عَنِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: concerning the sinners,

verses.content: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِي سَقَرَ
verses.translation: 'What caused you to be thrust into the Scorching (Fire)'

verses.content: قَالُوا لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ الْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: They will reply: 'We were not among those who prayed

verses.content: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ الْمِسْكِينَ
verses.translation: and we did not feed the needy.

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ الْخَائِضِينَ
verses.translation: We plunged in with the plungers

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: and belied the Day of Recompense

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ
verses.translation: till the certainty (death) overtook us'

verses.content: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ
verses.translation: The intercession of their intercessors shall not benefit them.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: What is the matter with them that they turn away from this Reminder,

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: like startled wild donkeys

verses.content: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍ
verses.translation: fleeing before a lion?

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
verses.translation: Indeed, each one of them desires to be given unrolled scrolls.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: No, indeed they have no fear of the Everlasting Life.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: No, indeed, surely, this is a Reminder.

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: So, whoever wills, will remember it.

verses.content: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.translation: But none will remember, unless Allah wills, He is the Owner of fear, the Owner of forgiveness.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: No! I swear by the Day of Resurrection,

verses.content: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.translation: No! I swear by the reproachful soul!

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ
verses.translation: What, does the human think We shall never gather his bones?

verses.content: بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ
verses.translation: Indeed yes, We are able to shape his fingerstips yet again!

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ
verses.translation: Rather, the human desires to continue in his immorality,

verses.content: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: 'When will the Day of Resurrection be' he asks,

verses.content: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ
verses.translation: but when the sight is dazed

verses.content: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: and the moon eclipsed,

verses.content: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: when the sun and moon are gathered together

verses.content: يَقُولُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ
verses.translation: on that Day the human will ask: 'To (which place) shall I flee'

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.translation: No, there shall be no (place of) refuge.

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ
verses.translation: For on that Day the refuge shall be to your Lord.

verses.content: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: On that Day the human shall be informed of his former and latter deeds.

verses.content: بَلِ الْإِنسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ
verses.translation: He shall be a clear proof against himself,

verses.content: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُ
verses.translation: even though he offers his excuses.

verses.content: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ
verses.translation: Do not move your tongue with it (the Revelation) to hasten it.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: It's gathering and reciting is upon Us.

verses.content: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: When We recite it, follow its recitation.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ
verses.translation: It's explanation is upon Us.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ
verses.translation: Yet you love this hasty world

verses.content: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: and are heedless of the Everlasting Life.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ
verses.translation: On that Day there shall be radiant faces,

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
verses.translation: gazing towards their Lord.

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: And on that Day there shall be scowling faces,

verses.content: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
verses.translation: so they might think the Calamity had been inflicted upon them.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ
verses.translation: But, when (the soul) reaches the collar bone

verses.content: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ
verses.translation: and it is said: 'Who is a healing chanter'

verses.content: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ
verses.translation: and when he thinks it is the time of departure

verses.content: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ
verses.translation: and when leg is intertwined with leg,

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ
verses.translation: upon that Day the driving shall be to your Lord.

verses.content: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Because, he neither believed nor prayed;

verses.content: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: he belied the truth and turned away;

verses.content: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ
verses.translation: then went arrogantly to his household.

verses.content: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Near to you and nearer,

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: then nearer to you and nearer!

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
verses.translation: Does the human think he will be left to roam at will?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِيٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: What, was he not an ejaculated drop (of sperm)?

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he was a clot of blood, then He created and formed him

verses.content: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: and made from him two kinds, male and female.

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.translation: What, is He then unable to revive the dead?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنسَانِ حِينٌ مِّنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْئًا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, there came upon the human a period of time when he was an unremembered thing.

verses.content: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: We have created the human from a (sperm) drop, a mixture, testing him; We made him to hear and see.

verses.content: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have guided him to the path, he is either grateful or ungrateful.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, for the unbelievers We have prepared chains, fetters and a Blazing (Fire).

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: But the righteous shall drink of a goblet mixed with camphor;

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.translation: a fountain at which the worshipers of Allah drink and make it gush forth abundantly;

verses.content: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.translation: they who keep their vows and fear a Day whose evil is spread;

verses.content: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: who give food, for the love of Him to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,

verses.content: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: (saying): 'We feed you only desirous of the Face of Allah; we seek of you neither recompense nor thanks,

verses.content: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.translation: for we fear from our Lord a stern, frownful Day'

verses.content: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.translation: So Allah will save them from the evil of that Day and has secured for them radiance and joyfulness,

verses.content: وَجَزَاهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.translation: and recompense them for their patience with a Garden, and robes of silk.

verses.content: مُّتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.translation: Reclining there upon couches, they shall see neither the sun nor the moon.

verses.content: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.translation: Near them shall be its shades with its clusters hung gently down,

verses.content: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِآنِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا
verses.translation: and passed around them shall be silver vessels, and crystal goblets,

verses.content: قَوَارِيرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: goblets of silver that they have precisely measured.

verses.content: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: And they shall be given to drink from a cup whose mixture is ginger,

verses.content: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.translation: from a fountain called Salsabila.

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: Immortal youths will go about them, when you see them, you would suppose them to be scattered pearls.

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: When you see them, you see bliss, and a great Kingdom.

verses.content: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: Upon them there will be garments of green silk, rich brocade, and they will be adorned with bracelets of silver. Their Lord will give them a pure beverage to drink.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: 'See, this is your recompense, your striving is thanked'

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: We have indeed, sent down to you the Koran, a (clear) sending,

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.translation: therefore be patient under the Judgement of your Lord, and do not obey either the sinner or the unbeliever.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: And, remember the Name of your Lord at the dawn and in the evening;

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: and in the night prostrate to Him; and exalt Him for a long night.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, these love the hasty life, and are heedless and leave behind them a heavy Day.

verses.content: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: We created them, and We strengthened their joints, but, when We will, We shall indeed exchange their likes.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: This is indeed a Reminder, so that he who will, takes a path to his Lord.

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: Yet you will not unless Allah wills; surely, Allah is the Knower, the Wise.

verses.content: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: He is Merciful to whom He will; but, for the harmdoers He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا
verses.translation: By (the wind) those sent (as horses') mane (in succession),

verses.content: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا
verses.translation: storming tempestuously

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا
verses.translation: and by the scatterers scattering (rain)

verses.content: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا
verses.translation: then the criterion (the verses of Koran), separating

verses.content: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: and those (angels) dropping, reminding

verses.content: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
verses.translation: excusing or warning,

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: surely, that which you have been promised is about to fall!

verses.content: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
verses.translation: When the stars are extinguished,

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ
verses.translation: and when the sky is rent asunder

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
verses.translation: and the mountains scattered,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
verses.translation: and when the Messengers' time is set

verses.content: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
verses.translation: to what day shall they be deferred?

verses.content: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: Upon the Day of Decision!

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: Would that you knew what the Day of Decision is!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to those who belied it!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Did We not destroy the ancients

verses.content: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: and let the latter follow them?

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: As such shall We deal with the sinners.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to those who belied it!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّاءٍ مَّهِينٍ
verses.translation: Did We not create you from a weak water,

verses.content: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: which We placed within a sure lodging

verses.content: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: for an appointed term?

verses.content: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: We determined, how excellent a Determiner are We!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to those who belied it!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth a housing

verses.content: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا
verses.translation: for both the living and the dead?

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُم مَّاءً فُرَاتًا
verses.translation: Have We not placed high mountains upon it and filled you with sweet water?

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to those who belied it!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Depart to that which you belied!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ
verses.translation: Depart into the shadow of three masses,

verses.content: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ
verses.translation: wherein there is neither shade, nor freeing from the blazing flames

verses.content: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ
verses.translation: it throws spits as (high as a huge) palace,

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ
verses.translation: as black camels.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to those who belied it!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: This is the Day they shall not speak,

verses.content: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
verses.translation: nor shall they be given permission, so that they can apologize.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to those who belied it!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Such is the Day of Decision. We will gather you with the ancients.

verses.content: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.translation: If you are cunning, then try your cunning against Me!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to those who belied it!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the cautious, shall live amid shades and fountains

verses.content: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: and have such fruits as they desire.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: (It shall be said to them): 'Eat and drink, with a good appetite, for all that you did'

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: As such We recompense those who did good.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to those who belied it!

verses.content: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: 'Eat and enjoy yourselves a little, for you are sinners'

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to those who belied it!

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.translation: When it is said to them: 'Bow yourselves' they do not bow.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to those who belied it!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: After this, in what discourse will they believe?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: What do they question each other about!

verses.content: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: About the Great News

verses.content: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: whereupon they are at variance?

verses.content: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, they shall know!

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Again, indeed, they shall know!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth as a cradle

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
verses.translation: and the mountains as pegs?

verses.content: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And We created you in pairs,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
verses.translation: and We made your sleep a rest,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
verses.translation: and We made the night a mantle,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
verses.translation: and We made the day for a livelihood.

verses.content: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
verses.translation: And We built above you seven strong ones,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
verses.translation: and placed in them a blazing lamp

verses.content: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا
verses.translation: and have sent down from the clouds, pouring rain

verses.content: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
verses.translation: that We may bring forth with it grain, plants

verses.content: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا
verses.translation: and luxuriant gardens.

verses.content: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا
verses.translation: Indeed, the Day of Decision is an appointed time,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: the Day that the Horn is blown, and you shall come in crowds

verses.content: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا
verses.translation: and heaven is opened, having gates,

verses.content: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
verses.translation: and the mountains move, and vaporize.

verses.content: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
verses.translation: Indeed, Gehenna (Hell) has become an ambush,

verses.content: لِّلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا
verses.translation: a return for the insolent,

verses.content: لَّابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا
verses.translation: there, they shall live for ages,

verses.content: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: tasting neither coolness nor any drink

verses.content: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
verses.translation: except boiling water and pus

verses.content: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا
verses.translation: for a suitable recompense.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
verses.translation: Indeed, they did not hope for a Reckoning,

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: and they absolutely belied Our verses,

verses.content: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا
verses.translation: and everything We have numbered in a Book.

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: 'Taste! We shall not increase you except in punishment'

verses.content: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: But, for the cautious a place of prosperity,

verses.content: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا
verses.translation: and gardens and vineyards,

verses.content: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: curvaceous (virgins), of equal age

verses.content: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
verses.translation: and an overflowing cup.

verses.content: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: There, they shall neither hear idle talk, nor yet any falsehood,

verses.content: جَزَاءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا
verses.translation: a recompense from your Lord, a gift, a reckoning,

verses.content: رَّبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.translation: the Lord of the heavens and earth, and all that is between them, the Merciful, of whom they are unable to speak.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.translation: On that Day, when the Spirit (Gabriel) and the angels stand in ranks they shall not speak, except he to whom the Merciful has given permission, and sayswhat is right.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
verses.translation: That is the Day, the truth, so whosoever wills takes a way to his Lord.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَابًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have forewarned you of an imminent punishment, the Day when the person will look upon his works and the unbelievers will say: 'Would that I were dust'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا
verses.translation: By the pluckers (the angels of death), violently plucking (the souls of the unbelievers),

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا
verses.translation: by the drawers (the angels of death), gently drawing (the souls of the believers),

verses.content: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا
verses.translation: by the swimmers (angels) swimming gently

verses.content: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا
verses.translation: and the outstrippers (angels), outstripping,

verses.content: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: by the managers (angels) affair.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.translation: On the Day, the shiverer shivers

verses.content: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ
verses.translation: followed by the succeeding,

verses.content: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.translation: hearts will throb on that Day

verses.content: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: and their eyes will be humbled.

verses.content: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ
verses.translation: They say: 'What, are we being restored as we were before,

verses.content: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَّخِرَةً
verses.translation: even after we are fragmented bones'

verses.content: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: They will say: 'Then we are returned lost'

verses.content: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
verses.translation: But it will be only a single blow,

verses.content: فَإِذَا هُم بِالسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.translation: and they will be upon the surface of the earth (alive).

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Have you received the story of Moses?

verses.content: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: His Lord called to him in the Sacred Valley of Towa,

verses.content: اذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: saying 'Go to Pharaoh, he has become exceedingly insolent,

verses.content: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: and say: "Will you purify yourself,

verses.content: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: that I might guide you to your Lord, so that you fear (Him)."

verses.content: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: He showed him the mighty sign,

verses.content: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.translation: but he belied and disobeyed,

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: and hastily turned away,

verses.content: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.translation: then, he gathered, proclaimed, then said:

verses.content: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: 'I am your lord, the most high'

verses.content: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: So Allah seized him with the punishment of the Everlasting Life, and of this world.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Surely, in this there is a lesson for he that fears!

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ ۚ بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: What, are you harder to create than the heaven which He has built?

verses.content: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: He raised it high and leveled it,

verses.content: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: and darkened its night and brought forth its morning.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَاهَا
verses.translation: And the earth He extended after that;

verses.content: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا
verses.translation: and then brought from it its water and pastures.

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: And the mountains He set firm

verses.content: مَتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: an enjoyment for you and your herds.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: But when the Great Catastrophe comes,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: the Day when the human will remember what he has worked for,

verses.content: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: and when Hell is advanced for whoever sees,

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: then as for whosoever was insolent

verses.content: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: preferring the present life,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: surely, Hell will be their refuge.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: But, whosoever feared the standing before his Lord and prevented the self from desires,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: indeed, their refuge shall be Paradise.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: They will question you about the Hour: 'When shall it be'

verses.content: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَاهَا
verses.translation: But how are you to know?

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَاهَا
verses.translation: Its final end is for your Lord.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَاهَا
verses.translation: You are but a warner for those who fear it.

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: On the Day when they behold it, it will be as if they had lingered but an evening, or, a morning.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: He frowned and turned away

verses.content: أَن جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: when the blind came to him.

verses.content: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And what could let you know? Perhaps he (comes to hear you) to be purified.

verses.content: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: (He might) remember, and the Reminder might profit him.

verses.content: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: As for he who is sufficed

verses.content: فَأَنتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: you attended to him,

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: although it is not for you to be concerned if he remained unpurified.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: And to him who came to you eagerly

verses.content: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: and fearfully,

verses.content: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: of him you were unmindful.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: No indeed, this is a Reminder;

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: and whosoever wills, shall remember it.

verses.content: فِي صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
verses.translation: upon highly honored pages,

verses.content: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍ
verses.translation: exalted, purified,

verses.content: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
verses.translation: by the hands of scribes

verses.content: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
verses.translation: noble and pious.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
verses.translation: Perish the human! How unthankful he is!

verses.content: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
verses.translation: From what did He create him?

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
verses.translation: From a (sperm) drop He created him and then determined him,

verses.content: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
verses.translation: then eased his path for him,

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
verses.translation: then causes him to die and buries him,

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنشَرَهُ
verses.translation: then, He will raise him when He wills.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
verses.translation: Indeed, he has not fulfilled that which He has ordered him.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
verses.translation: Let the human reflect on the food he eats,

verses.content: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
verses.translation: how We pour down rain in abundance,

verses.content: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
verses.translation: and split the earth, splitting,

verses.content: فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
verses.translation: how We made the grain to grow,

verses.content: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
verses.translation: grapes, and fresh fodder,

verses.content: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
verses.translation: and the olive, and the palm,

verses.content: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
verses.translation: the densely tree'd gardens,

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
verses.translation: and fruit and pastures,

verses.content: مَّتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: for you and for your herds to delight in.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
verses.translation: But, when the Blast comes,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
verses.translation: on that Day each person will flee from his brother,

verses.content: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.translation: his mother and his father,

verses.content: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: his wife and his children.

verses.content: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.translation: Everyone on that Day will have affairs to keep him occupied.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Some faces will shine,

verses.content: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
verses.translation: laughing and joyful,

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
verses.translation: whereas some faces will be covered with dust

verses.content: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: and veiled with darkness.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: Those, they are the unbelievers, the immoral.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the sun is woundup;

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انكَدَرَتْ
verses.translation: when the stars are thrown down,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.translation: and the mountains have been taken,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.translation: when the pregnant camels are neglected,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: when the savage beasts are gathered

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: when the seas are set boiling,

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.translation: when the souls are coupled (to their body),

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.translation: when the buried female infant is asked

verses.content: بِأَيِّ ذَنبٍ قُتِلَتْ
verses.translation: for what crime she was slain,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: when the scrolls are unrolled,

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.translation: when heaven is stripped,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.translation: when Hell is set ablaze,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.translation: when Paradise is brought near,

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.translation: then, each soul shall know what it has produced.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
verses.translation: Rather, I swear by the returning

verses.content: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
verses.translation: orbiting, disappearing;

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.translation: by the night when it approaches

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: and the morning when it extends,

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: it is indeed the word of an Honorable Messenger,

verses.content: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.translation: of power, given a rank by the Owner of the Throne

verses.content: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
verses.translation: obeyed, and honest.

verses.content: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Your Companion is not mad,

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: in truth he saw him (Gabriel) on the clear horizon,

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
verses.translation: he is not grudging of the Unseen.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ
verses.translation: Nor is this the word of a stoned satan.

verses.content: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
verses.translation: Where then are you going?

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: This is nothing but a Reminder to the worlds,

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: for whosoever of you would go straight,

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: but you shall not, unless Allah wills, the Lord of all the Worlds.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انفَطَرَتْ
verses.translation: When the sky is split,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انتَثَرَتْ
verses.translation: when the planets are scattered,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: when the oceans are gushed forth,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
verses.translation: when the graves are overturned,

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
verses.translation: the soul shall know what it has done, the former and the latter.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: O human! What has deceived you concerning your Generous Lord

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.translation: who created you, formed you and proportioned you?

verses.content: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.translation: In whatever shape He will He could surely have fashioned you.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Rather, you belied the Recompense.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: Yet over you there are watchers,

verses.content: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
verses.translation: noble scribes

verses.content: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: who know of all that you do.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous shall (live) in bliss.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: But the wicked, indeed they shall be in the Fiery Furnace,

verses.content: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: roasting in it on the Day of Recompense

verses.content: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
verses.translation: and from it they shall never be absent.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: What could let you know what the Day of Recompense is!

verses.content: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Again, what could let you know what the Day of Recompense is!

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
verses.translation: It is the Day when no soul can do a thing for another soul. That Day, the command belongs to Allah.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Woe to the diminishers,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: who, when people measure for them, take full measure,

verses.content: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
verses.translation: but when they measure or weigh for others, they reduce!

verses.content: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

verses.content: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: for a great Day,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: the Day when people will stand before the Lord of the Worlds?

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation: No indeed, the Book of the immoral is in Sijjeen.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
verses.translation: What could let you know what the Sijjeen is!

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: (It is) a marked Book.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day to those who belied it,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: who belied the Day of Recompense!

verses.content: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: None belies it except every guilty sinner.

verses.content: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says: 'Fictitious tales of the ancients'

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: No indeed! Their own deeds have cast a veil over their hearts.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: No indeed, on that Day they shall be veiled from their Lord.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then they shall roast in Hell,

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: and it will be said to them: 'This is that which you belied'

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: But, the Book of the righteous is in the 'Illiyoon.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.translation: What could let you know what the 'Illiyoon is!

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: (It is) a marked Book,

verses.content: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: witnessed by those who are near (to Allah).

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: The righteous shall indeed be blissful,

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: (reclining) upon couches they will gaze,

verses.content: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: and in their faces you shall know the radiance of bliss.

verses.content: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
verses.translation: They shall be given to drink of a wine that is sealed,

verses.content: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
verses.translation: its seal is musk, for this let the competitors compete;

verses.content: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
verses.translation: and its mixture is Tasneem,

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: a fountain at which those brought near (to their Lord) drink.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: The sinners laughed at the believers

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.translation: and winked at one another as they passed them by.

verses.content: وَإِذَا انقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: When they returned to their people they returned jesting;

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
verses.translation: and when they saw them said: 'These are they who are astray'

verses.content: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: Yet they were not sent to be their guardians.

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: But on this Day the believers will laugh at the unbelievers

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: as they (recline) upon their couches and gaze (around them).

verses.content: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Have the unbelievers been rewarded for what they did?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انشَقَّتْ
verses.translation: When the sky is torn apart,

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: hearing and obeying its Lord, as it must do;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.translation: when the earth is stretched out

verses.content: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.translation: and casts out all that is within and voids itself,

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: obeying its Lord, as it must do!

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
verses.translation: O human, you are working hard towards your Lord and you will meet Him.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
verses.translation: Then, he who is given his Book in his right hand

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
verses.translation: shall have an easy reckoning

verses.content: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: and will return rejoicing to his family.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
verses.translation: But he who is given his Book from behind his back

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: shall call for destruction

verses.content: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: and roast at the Blaze.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: Once, he lived joyfully among his family

verses.content: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.translation: and surely thought he would never return (to his Lord).

verses.content: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Yes indeed, his Lord was ever watching him.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
verses.translation: I swear by the twilight;

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.translation: by the night and all that it envelops;

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
verses.translation: by the moon, in its fullness

verses.content: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
verses.translation: that you shall surely ride from stage to stage.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: What is the matter with them, that they do not believe

verses.content: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.translation: and when the Koran is recited to them that they do not prostrate!

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: No, the unbelievers only belie,

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.translation: and Allah knows very well what they gather.

verses.content: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Therefore give to them glad tidings of a painful punishment,

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: except to those who believe, and do righteous deeds, for theirs is an unfailing recompense.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
verses.translation: By the heaven of the constellations!

verses.content: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
verses.translation: By the Promised Day!

verses.content: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
verses.translation: By the witness and the witnessed!

verses.content: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
verses.translation: The companions of the pit were killed

verses.content: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
verses.translation: the fire with its fuel,

verses.content: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
verses.translation: when they were seated around it

verses.content: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.translation: and they were witnesses of what they did to the believers

verses.content: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: and their revenge on them was only because they believed in Allah, the Almighty, the Praised,

verses.content: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: to whom belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and earth. And Allah is the Witness of all things.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Those who persecuted the believing men and women and never repented, there is for them the punishment of Gehenna (Hell), and for them the punishment of the burning.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: (But) for those who believe and do good works, for them there are Gardens underneath which rivers flow that is the Great Victory!

verses.content: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, the seizing of your Lord is severe.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.translation: It is He who originates and repeats.

verses.content: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
verses.translation: And He is the Forgiving, and the Loving.

verses.content: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
verses.translation: Owner of the Throne, the Exalted.

verses.content: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.translation: The Doer of whatever He wants.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
verses.translation: Has it come to you the story of the hosts

verses.content: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.translation: of Pharaoh and of Thamood?

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
verses.translation: Yet the unbelievers still belie,

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ مِن وَرَائِهِم مُّحِيطٌ
verses.translation: Allah encompasses them all from behind.

verses.content: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَّجِيدٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, this is a Glorious Koran,

verses.content: فِي لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍ
verses.translation: in a Guarded Tablet.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
verses.translation: By the sky, and by the nightly comer!

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
verses.translation: What could let you know what the nightly comer is!

verses.content: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
verses.translation: (It is) the piercing star.

verses.content: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.translation: For every soul there is a watcher.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.translation: Let the human reflect of what he is created.

verses.content: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ
verses.translation: He was created from ejaculated water

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِن بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
verses.translation: that issues from between the loins and the ribs.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
verses.translation: Surely, He is Able to bring him back,

verses.content: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
verses.translation: on the Day when consciences are examined,

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.translation: when he will be helpless, with no supporter.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
verses.translation: By the sky with its returning rain,

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
verses.translation: and by the earth bursting with vegetation;

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
verses.translation: this is indeed a Decisive Word,

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
verses.translation: it is not a jest.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: They are cunningly devising,

verses.content: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: and I am cunningly devising.

verses.content: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
verses.translation: Therefore respite the unbelievers, and delay them for a while.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
verses.translation: Exalt the Name of your Lord, the Highest,

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: who has created and shaped,

verses.content: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: who has ordained and guided,

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ
verses.translation: who brings forth the pastures,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ
verses.translation: then made it dry dark, flaky stubble,

verses.content: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall make you recite so that you will not forget,

verses.content: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.translation: except what Allah wills, surely, He knows all that is (spoken) aloud and what is hidden.

verses.content: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall ease you to the easy.

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Therefore remind, if the Reminder benefits,

verses.content: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: and he who fears shall remember,

verses.content: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: but the most wretched shall avoid it,

verses.content: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: who will roast in the Great Fire,

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.translation: in which he will neither die nor live therein.

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Prosperous is he who purifies himself,

verses.content: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: and remembers the Name of his Lord, so he prays.

verses.content: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: But you prefer the present life,

verses.content: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: but the Everlasting Life is better, and more enduring.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Surely, this is in the ancient Scrolls,

verses.content: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: the Scrolls of Abraham and Moses.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ
verses.translation: Have you received the news of the Enveloper?

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: On that Day faces shall be humbled,

verses.content: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
verses.translation: laboring, wornout,

verses.content: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
verses.translation: roasting at a scorching Fire

verses.content: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ
verses.translation: that is fueled from a tremendously hot fountain,

verses.content: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
verses.translation: no food for them except thorny plants

verses.content: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِن جُوعٍ
verses.translation: which neither sustains, nor satisfy hunger.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
verses.translation: (Whereas other) faces on that Day will be joyful,

verses.content: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
verses.translation: well pleased with their striving,

verses.content: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: in a Garden on high,

verses.content: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً
verses.translation: where they will hear no idle talk.

verses.content: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
verses.translation: A gushing fountain shall be there

verses.content: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: and raised couches,

verses.content: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: and prepared goblets,

verses.content: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
verses.translation: and arranged cushions

verses.content: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
verses.translation: and outspread carpets.

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
verses.translation: What, do they not reflect upon how the camel was created?

verses.content: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
verses.translation: And how the heaven was raised up,

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
verses.translation: and how the mountains were firmly fixed?

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
verses.translation: And how the earth was outstretched?

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
verses.translation: Therefore remind, you are only a Reminder.

verses.content: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
verses.translation: You are not charged to oversee them.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.translation: As for those who turn their back and disbelieve,

verses.content: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: Allah will punish them with the greatest punishment.

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ
verses.translation: Indeed, to Us they shall return,

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
verses.translation: then upon Us shall rest their reckoning.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: By the dawn

verses.content: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
verses.translation: and ten nights (of pilgrimage or the last ten days of Ramadan),
