verses.content: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ
verses.translation: by the even, and the odd,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
verses.translation: by the night when it journeys on!

verses.content: هَلْ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِي حِجْرٍ
verses.translation: Is there in that an oath for the mindful?

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation: Have you not heard how your Lord dealt with Aad?

verses.content: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ
verses.translation: of the columned (city) of Iram,

verses.content: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: the like of which was never created in the countries?

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ
verses.translation: And Thamood, who hewed out the rocks of the valley?

verses.content: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: And Pharaoh, of the pegs (impaling his victims)?

verses.content: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: They were tyrants in the land

verses.content: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ
verses.translation: and exceeded in corruption therein.

verses.content: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.translation: (Therefore) your Lord let loose upon them a scourge of punishment;

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ
verses.translation: indeed, your Lord is ever watchful.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْإِنسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.translation: As for man, when his Lord tests him by honoring him and favoring him, he says: 'My Lord, has honored me'

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
verses.translation: But when He tests him by restricting his provision, he says: 'My Lord has humiliated me'

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: No! But you show no good to the orphan,

verses.content: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: nor do you urge one another to feed the needy.

verses.content: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
verses.translation: and you devour the inheritance with greed,

verses.content: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
verses.translation: and you ardently love wealth.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
verses.translation: No! But when the earth quakes and is pounded,

verses.content: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
verses.translation: and your Lord comes with the angels, rank upon rank,

verses.content: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: and Gehenna (Hell) is brought near on that Day the human will remember, and how shall the Reminder be for him?

verses.content: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي
verses.translation: He will say: 'Would that I had forwarded (good works) for my life!'

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: But on that Day none will punish as He (Allah) will punish,

verses.content: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: nor will any bind as He binds.

verses.content: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
verses.translation: O satisfied soul,

verses.content: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
verses.translation: return to your Lord wellpleased, wellpleasing.

verses.content: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي
verses.translation: Join My worshipers and

verses.content: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي
verses.translation: enter My Paradise!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: No, I swear by this country (Mecca),

verses.content: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: and you are a lodger in this country.

verses.content: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.translation: And by the giver of birth, and whom he fathered,

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
verses.translation: We created the human in fatigue.

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does he think that none has power over him!

verses.content: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
verses.translation: He will say: 'I have destroyed a vast wealth'

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does he think that none has observed him?

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُ عَيْنَيْنِ
verses.translation: Have We not given him two eyes,

verses.content: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
verses.translation: a tongue, and two lips,

verses.content: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ
verses.translation: and guided him on the two paths (of good and evil)?

verses.content: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ
verses.translation: Yet he has not scaled the height.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ
verses.translation: What could let you know what the height is!

verses.content: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.translation: (It is) the freeing of a slave,

verses.content: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.translation: the giving of food upon the day of hunger

verses.content: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: to an orphaned relative

verses.content: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: or to a needy person in distress;

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.translation: so that he becomes one of those who believe, charge each other to be patient, and charge each other to be merciful.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Those are the Companions of the Right.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.translation: But those who disbelieve in Our verses, they are the Companions of the Left,

verses.content: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: with the Fire closed above them.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: By the sun and its midmorning,

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا
verses.translation: by the moon, which follows it,

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا
verses.translation: by the day, when it displays it,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا
verses.translation: by the night, when it envelops it!

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: By the heaven and Who built it,

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا
verses.translation: by the earth and Who spread it,

verses.content: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: by the soul and Who shaped it

verses.content: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا
verses.translation: and inspired it with its sin and its piety,

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
verses.translation: prosperous is he who purified it,

verses.content: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّاهَا
verses.translation: and failed is he who buried it!

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا
verses.translation: Thamood belied in their pride

verses.content: إِذِ انبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا
verses.translation: when the most wicked of them broke forth,

verses.content: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
verses.translation: the Messenger of Allah said to them: '(This is) the shecamel of Allah, let her drink'

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: But they belied him, and hamstrung her. So their Lord crushed them for their sin and leveled it (their village).

verses.content: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا
verses.translation: He does not fear the result (of their destruction).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: By the night, when it envelops,

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: and by the day when it unveils.

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: And by Who created the male and female,

verses.content: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: your striving is indeed to different ends!

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَاتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: For him that gives and fears (Allah)

verses.content: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: and believes in the finest,

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall surely ease him to the Path of Easing;

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: but for him that is a miser, and sufficed,

verses.content: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: and he belied the finest

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall surely ease for him the Path of Hardship (the Fire).

verses.content: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: When he falls (into Hell), his wealth will not help him.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, Guidance is Ours,

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: and to Us belong the Last and the First.

verses.content: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.translation: I have now warned you of the Blazing Fire,

verses.content: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: in which none shall be roasted except the most wretched sinner,

verses.content: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: who belied and turned away,

verses.content: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى
verses.translation: and from which the cautious shall be distanced.

verses.content: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: He who gives his wealth to be purified,

verses.content: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰ
verses.translation: and confers no favor upon anyone for recompense

verses.content: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: seeking only the Face of his Lord, the Most High,

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: surely, he shall be satisfied.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالضُّحَىٰ
verses.translation: By the midmorning,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.translation: and by the night when it covers,

verses.content: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.translation: your Lord has not forsaken you (Prophet Muhammad), nor does He hate you.

verses.content: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: The Last shall be better for you than the First.

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: Your Lord will give you, and you will be satisfied.

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find you an orphan and give you shelter?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find you a wanderer so He guided you?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find you poor and suffice you?

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
verses.translation: Do not oppress the orphan,

verses.content: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
verses.translation: nor drive away the one who asks.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
verses.translation: But tell of the favors of your Lord!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.translation: Have We not expanded your chest for you (Prophet Muhammad),

verses.content: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
verses.translation: and relieved you of your burden

verses.content: الَّذِي أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
verses.translation: that weighed down your back?

verses.content: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
verses.translation: Have We not raised your remembrance?

verses.content: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, hardship is followed by ease,

verses.content: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: indeed, hardship is followed by ease!

verses.content: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانصَبْ
verses.translation: So, when you have finished (your prayer), labor (in supplication),

verses.content: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارْغَب
verses.translation: and let your longing be for your Lord (in humility).

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
verses.translation: By the fig and the olive!

verses.content: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.translation: and the Mount, Sinai,

verses.content: وَهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ
verses.translation: and this safe country (Mecca)!

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, We created the human with the fairest stature

verses.content: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ
verses.translation: and We shall return him to the lowest of the low,

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: except the believers who do good works, for theirs shall be an unfailing recompense.

verses.content: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: So, what then shall belie you concerning the Recompense?

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ
verses.translation: Is Allah not the Most Just of judges!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
verses.translation: Read (Prophet Muhammad) in the Name of your Lord who created,

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
verses.translation: created the human from a (blood) clot.

verses.content: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ
verses.translation: Read! Your Lord is the Most Generous,

verses.content: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
verses.translation: who taught by the pen,

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْإِنسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.translation: taught the human what he did not know.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَيَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, surely the human is very insolent

verses.content: أَن رَّآهُ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: that he sees himself sufficed.

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, to your Lord is the returning.

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَىٰ
verses.translation: What do you think? Have you seen he who forbids

verses.content: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: a worshiper when he prays.

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Have you seen if he was upon guidance

verses.content: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَىٰ
verses.translation: or orders piety?

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: What do you think? Have you seen if he belies and turns away,

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: does he not know that Allah sees?

verses.content: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.translation: Indeed, if he does not desist, We will seize him by the forelock,

verses.content: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
verses.translation: a lying, sinful forelock.

verses.content: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ
verses.translation: So, let him call upon his way!

verses.content: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.translation: We, will call the Zabania (the harsh angels of Hell).

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِب ۩
verses.translation: No, indeed; do not obey him! Prostrate and come nearer (to Allah).

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: We sent this (the Holy Koran) down on the Night of Honor.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: What could let you know what the Night of Honor is!

verses.content: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.translation: The Night of Honor is better than a thousand months,

verses.content: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.translation: in it the angels and the Spirit (Gabriel) descend by the permission of their Lord upon every command.

verses.content: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: Peace it is, till the break of dawn.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: The unbelievers among the People of the Book and the idolaters would never desist until the Clear Proof came to them.

verses.content: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
verses.translation: A Messenger from Allah reciting Purified Pages

verses.content: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
verses.translation: in which there are valuable Books.

verses.content: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: Those to whom the Book was given did not divide themselves until the Clear Proof came to them.

verses.content: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.translation: Yet they were ordered to worship Allah alone, making the Religion His sincerely, upright, and to establish their prayers and to pay the obligatory charity. That is indeed the Religion of Straightness.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: The unbelievers among the People of the Book and the idolaters shall be for ever in the Fire of Gehenna (Hell). They are the worst of all creatures.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: But those who believe and do good deeds are the best of all creatures.

verses.content: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
verses.translation: Their recompense is with their Lord; Gardens of Eden, underneath which rivers flow, where they shall live for ever. Allah is wellpleased with them, and theyare wellpleased with Him. That is for he who fears his Lord!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
verses.translation: When the earth is shaken with its mighty shaking,

verses.content: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.translation: and when the earth brings forth its burdens

verses.content: وَقَالَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا لَهَا
verses.translation: and the human asks: "What is the matter with it?"

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
verses.translation: On that Day it shall proclaim its news,

verses.content: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.translation: for your Lord will have revealed to it.

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
verses.translation: On that Day mankind shall issue in scatterings to see their deeds.

verses.content: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: Whosoever has done an atom's weight of good shall see it,

verses.content: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: and whosoever has done an atom's weight of evil shall see it.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا
verses.translation: By the snorting runners (the horses),

verses.content: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا
verses.translation: by the strikers of fire,

verses.content: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا
verses.translation: by the dawnraiders,

verses.content: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا
verses.translation: raising a trail of dust,

verses.content: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا
verses.translation: dividing the gathering.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, the human is ungrateful to his Lord.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: To this he himself shall bear witness.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: And indeed he is ardent for the love of good (wealth, becoming greedy).

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: Does he not know that when that which is in the graves is overthrown,

verses.content: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: and that which is in the chest is brought out,

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: indeed, on that Day their Lord will be aware of them!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: The Clatterer (the Day of Judgement)!

verses.content: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: What is the Clatterer.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: What shall let you know what the Clatterer is!

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ
verses.translation: On that Day people shall become like scattered moths

verses.content: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنفُوشِ
verses.translation: and the mountains like tufts of carded wool.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: Then he whose deeds weigh heavy in the Scale

verses.content: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: shall live in a life which is pleasing,

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: but he whose weight is light in the Scale,

verses.content: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ
verses.translation: his head will be in the Plunging

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ
verses.translation: What shall let you know what the Plunging is?

verses.content: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ
verses.translation: (It is) a Fire which is extremely hot.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ
verses.translation: The excessive gathering (of increase and boasting) occupied you (from worshipping and obeying)

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
verses.translation: until you visit the graves.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: But no, indeed, you shall soon know.

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Again, no indeed, you shall soon know.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Indeed, did you know with certain knowledge

verses.content: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
verses.translation: that you shall surely see Hell?

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Again, you shall surely see it with the sight of certainty.

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: On that Day, you shall be questioned about the pleasures.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَصْرِ
verses.translation: By the time of the afternoon!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
verses.translation: Surely, the human is in a (state of) loss,

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
verses.translation: except those who believe and do good works and charge one another with the truth and charge one another with patience.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
verses.translation: Woe to every backbiter, slanderer

verses.content: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
verses.translation: who amasses wealth and counts it,

verses.content: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ
verses.translation: thinking his wealth will render him immortal!

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ
verses.translation: On the contrary! He shall be flung to the Crusher.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ
verses.translation: What shall let you know what the Crusher is?

verses.content: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ
verses.translation: (It is) the kindled Fire of Allah,

verses.content: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ
verses.translation: which shall oversee the hearts,

verses.content: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: closed around them

verses.content: فِي عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍ
verses.translation: in extended columns.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
verses.translation: Have you not seen how Allah dealt with the companions of the Elephant?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ
verses.translation: Did He not cause their schemes to go astray?

verses.content: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
verses.translation: And He sent against them flights of birds

verses.content: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
verses.translation: pelting them with stones of baked clay,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍ
verses.translation: so that He made them like straw eaten (by cattle).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
verses.translation: For the custom of the Koraysh,

verses.content: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ
verses.translation: their custom of the winter and summer journey.

verses.content: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَـٰذَا الْبَيْتِ
verses.translation: Therefore let them worship the Lord of this House

verses.content: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
verses.translation: who fed them from hunger and secured them from fear.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Have you seen he who belied the Recompense?

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: It is he who turns away the orphan

verses.content: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: and does not urge others to feed the needy.

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: Woe to those who pray,

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: who are heedless of their prayers (delaying them from their prescribed times),

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ
verses.translation: who show off,

verses.content: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ
verses.translation: and prevent the utensils of assistance.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We have given you (Prophet Muhammad) the abundance (Al Kawthar: river, its pool and springs).

verses.content: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
verses.translation: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice.

verses.content: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ
verses.translation: Surely, he who hates you, he is the most severed.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ
verses.translation: Say: 'O unbelievers,

verses.content: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: I do not worship what you worship,

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: nor do you worship what I worship.

verses.content: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
verses.translation: Nor am I worshiping what you have worshipped,

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: neither will you worship what I worship.

verses.content: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
verses.translation: To you your religion, and to me my Religion'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
verses.translation: When the victory of Allah and the opening comes,

verses.content: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: and you see people embracing the Religion of Allah in throngs,

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
verses.translation: exalt with the praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness from Him. For indeed, He is the Turner (for the penitent).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
verses.translation: Perish the hands of AbiLahab, and perish he!

verses.content: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: His wealth will not suffice him, neither what he has gained;

verses.content: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
verses.translation: he shall roast at a Flaming Fire,

verses.content: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ
verses.translation: and his wife, laden with firewood

verses.content: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍ
verses.translation: shall have a rope of palmfiber around her neck!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Say: 'He is Allah, the One,

verses.content: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
verses.translation: the called upon.

verses.content: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.translation: Who has not given birth, and has not been born,

verses.content: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: and there is none equal to Him'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
verses.translation: Say: 'I take refuge with the Lord of Daybreak

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.translation: from the evil of what He has created,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
verses.translation: from the evil of the darkness when it gathers

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ
verses.translation: from the evil of the blowers on knots;

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
verses.translation: from the evil of the envier when he envies'

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: Say: 'I take refuge with the Lord of people,

verses.content: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: the King of people,

verses.content: إِلَـٰهِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: the God of people,

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
verses.translation: from the evil of the slinking whisperer.

verses.content: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: who whispers in the chests of people,

verses.content: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
verses.translation: both jinn and people.'
